description: Message Bible+ by Olive Tree is a must-have app for reading and studying God’s Holy Word. Take notes, highlights, and bookmarks in the app and sync to all your devices. This free Bible Study App features a powerful Resource Guide that links your Bible text with outstanding study Bibles, maps, commentaries, and more for an in-depth Bible study experience. Start a Bible reading plan and Bible+ will track your progress as you read through Scripture. Our unique split window allows you to create your own customized parallel Bible to easily compare Bible translations. Install now and explore over 100 more free titles. Message Bible+ by Olive Tree includes The Message Bible translation. OFF-LINE BIBLE STUDY Your library, notes, highlights and all of the app features are stored on your device so that you have full functionality when you are offline or in airplane mode. CLOUD SYNC Sync your Bible study resources, highlights, notes, bookmarks, and book ribbons between any devices with Bible+. POWERFUL RESOURCE GUIDE With our one-of-a-kind Resource Guide, perform powerful searches through your entire Library of Bibles, Bible commentaries, Bible dictionaries, and more. FAST VERSE NAVIGATION With our unique 3-touch Verse Chooser, you can navigate quickly and easily to the exact Bible verse you want. SIDE-BY-SIDE STUDY The split window feature allows you to create your own customized parallel Bible for translation comparison, view your study notes while you read, or follow along with a commentary while you study Scripture. IMMERSIVE BIBLE STUDY Remove distractions by opening your books and Bibles in full screen and immerse yourself in Scripture. PERSONAL BIBLE STUDY * Highlight words and passages * Take your own personalized notes * Bookmark verses * Tag anything to find it quickly later * Leave a book ribbon on a page in order to pick up where you left off * Select and copy text from any Bible or book in your Library DAILY READING PLANS *Free downloadable reading plans on various topics, books of the Bible, or specific biblical characters *Sync your reading plan across your devices with Bible+ *Plans vary in length with options as short as 5 days to as long as three years! SOCIAL BIBLE STUDY Instantly share the Bible with your friends from inside the app. Tap on a verse to share it through Twitter, Facebook or via email. AMAZING BIBLE STUDY LIBRARY The Olive Tree catalog of Bible study resources is constantly growing and offers over a hundred FREE resources and over three thousand titles available for purchase. BIBLES INCLUDED The Message Bible translation. OTHER BIBLES AND BIBLE STUDY RESOURCES AVAILABLE FOR PURCHASE IN-APP: * New International Version (NIV), The Message, Amplified Bible, New King James Version (NKJV), New American Standard Bible (NASB), New Living Translation (NLT), New Revised Standard Version (NRSV), and over 100 more! * Best-selling study Bibles: ESV Study Bible, NLT Study Bible, NIV Study Notes, NKJV Study Notes, Life Application Study Bible, Reformation Study Bible Notes *Word Study Bibles with Strong’s Numbers in NIV, KJV, ESV, NKJV, HCSB and NASB Bible translations * Commentaries and Study Tools: Vine’s Expository Dictionary, Expositor’s Bible Commentary; Olive Tree Bible Maps, Bible Knowledge Commentary, Zondervan Atlas of the Bible *Interlinear Bibles: Easily compare the Original Languages of the Bible with ESV, KJV, and NKJV Bible translations. *Harmony of the Gospels: Read through the life of Jesus chronologically with our unique Gospel harmonies. *Original language Bibles: Greek New Testament: NA28 & UBS-4; Hebrew Old Testament: BHS; Greek Old Testament: Septuaginta, LXX * Non-English Bibles including Spanish, Portuguese, German and more: Reina-Valera, Almeida Revista e Atualizada, Dios Habla Hoy, Luther Bibel 1984, Louis Segond, Indonesian Bible AND MANY MORE!
release_text: 6.0.4 We made it easier to tap note icons, footnotes, cross-references, etc. App now opens where you left off Fixed text selection in non-english localizations Other bug fixes

description: You need to learn Morse code? Or you would ever learn to secretly transmit messages to your friends? Then this app is perfect for you. Listen how sound characters in Russian and Latin alphabets, train your skills in transmitting with built-in keyboard or as on real Morse decoding device, and in receiving encoded messages. Challenge yourself - transmit many symbols you can in 1 minute, get awards for best your results and tell about your achievements friends in social networks. App features: -Supporting for Russian and international Morse code; -Transmitting character using built-in keyboard(for beginners) or the touchpad( as in real Morse encoding device); -Two mode of transmit training - generated sequence of symbols and words; -Speed transmitting test; -Several type of transmitters(receiving training): custom tone, system tone(DTMF), camera flash, screen and vibro; -Displaying obtained achievements and the capability to share them with your friends. -Morse code handbook with playing encoded character sound and mnemonics for better learning. -Playing text files. -Posting inputed text to your friends throgh SMS or social networks PLEASE RATE AND REVIEW APP. Thanks in advance:)

High Penpal! Is not the application of the chat format that is popular recently. It is close to the old-fashioned correspondence there is a pleasure to send a message you wrote to think deeply long, wait for a reply while pounding. You dare tell me the language and culture of each other while interacting with people around the world American, British, French, Vietnamese, Thai, Korean, and Chinese. What you can do with high pen pal!. - Language can be learned English, Spanish, French, Chinese, and Korean using a language exchange. - Cultural exchange possible news to the world while the Japanese culture. - Replace the information of your favorite entertainer, possible exchange of letters and gifts.

The official app of the Malaysian Medical Resources website ( http://medicine.com.my ) The Malaysian Medical Resources was conceived back in 1996 as a webpage which serves as a repository for links to Malaysian Medical and Health websites. Through the years, the links have been constantly maintained and updated. The site now incorporates a blog by Malaysian doctors and keeps track of Malaysian medical news. While the website has a mobile friendly version, this app serves to make it easier for smartphone users to access sections of the MMR Features: - Quick links to the important sections of the MMR - Useful phone numbers (emergency and hospitals) provided in an easy access menu, allows you to dial out from your phone - Search the MMR function - Locate nearby hospital or clinic (requires a device with location services enabled) Caveats: - An Internet connection is required in order to use this app - Formatting optimised for smartphones, rendering in tablets may not be optimal - Links will open in an internal web browser, use the Done button to return to the app.
release_text: Updated February 2014 Changed UI of main page Updated Links Web sites now open in Inappbrowser - click Done to get back to app

description: MineSweeper with a Hillbilly twist this is a very fun game to play and best of all it free!! for those who don't know what MineSweeper is:The game is played by revealing squares of the grid, typically by clicking them with a mouse. If a square containing a mine is revealed, the player loses the game. Otherwise, a digit is revealed in the square, indicating the number of adjacent squares (typically, out of the possible eight) that contain mines. In typical implementations, if this number is zero then the square appears blank, and the surrounding squares are automatically also revealed. By using logic, the player can in many instances use this information to deduce that certain other squares are mine-free, in which case they may be safely revealed, or mine-filled.

With this widget you will always have up to date spot prices on gold ,silver and platinum right on your home screen, no need to every mess around with any app to get spot prices again. -- There are a number of good reasons to invest in precious metals. Precious metals are physical commodities. They have value in and of themselves. They can be used as collateral or to purchase goods and services almost anywhere in the world. Things like currency, stocks and bonds are only pieces of paper and virtual goods. They may represent something of value, but they have no real value themselves. If the companies or governments that issued them fail they become worthless. Precious metals, on the other hand, retain their value regardless of what happens in the political/economic landscapes. The value of gold and silver can simply never go to zero.

Manage your headaches, migraines with this easy to use migraine diary that shows all headaches on a calendar. See the log in a list view format, edit or delete previous entries, email the report to your doctor. View the complete summary. Add your own custom triggers, symptoms or medications through settings. Automatically fetches the current weather and shows the weather condition on the calendar. It's a great migraine tracker. Can also be used to enter and track any other type of pain. In log view scrolls to the last headache event added. Keywords: Migraine logger, Headache Journal, Headache tracker
release_text: Updated UI for a more cleaner look. Updated weather api. Now weather is automatically added for new migraine events added. Fixed the resolution issue for devices having lower resolution such as Xperia Mini Pro. Fixed the bug where calendar wasn't updating without restarting the app after settings were changed.

Collection of 38 single-player open-source logic puzzle games, free, no ads, playable offline. All generated on demand with adjustable size/difficulty, so you'll never run out of puzzles. Various control options for small screens: on-screen arrow keys (can be enabled in Settings), pinch to zoom, and a new button to swap press/long-press. NFC lets you beam a puzzle to your friend's phone, like this: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nCw1ilMzCH4 Media permissions let you swap saved games with the versions for other platforms at http://is.gd/sgtpuz (via Save/Share actions) Help beta test future versions at http://is.gd/puzzbeta Contains the following 38 games: Black Box, Bridges, Cube, Dominosa, Fifteen, Filling, Flip, Flood, Galaxies, Guess, Inertia, Keen, Light Up, Loopy, Magnets, Map, Mines (Minesweeper), Net, Netslide, Pattern, Pearl, Pegs (Solitaire), Range, Rectangles, Same Game, Signpost, Singles, Sixteen, Slant, Solo (Sudoku), Tents, Towers, Tracks, Twiddle, Undead, Unequal, Unruly, Untangle
release_text: Compatible with Android 6.0 (Marshmallow) on which the Storage permission will be asked only when needed, which is when you open a puzzle from an out-of-date file manager. More tweaks to night colours, fixing missing flash in several games. Fix handling of file extensions.

Moola needs translation proofreaders! If you speak another language besides English please post in this forum: http://groups.google.com/group/moolausers?hl=en Featured on Phandroid.com! Easily track your finances, all in one place in this smart, sleek, digital checkbook/expense tracker/bill reminder. For about the price of your morning coffee, mooLa will help you organize and track your money and bills all year long. See your banks, credit cards, and bills in one simple, streamlined application. Control where your money goes and get important real-time alerts and reminders about your accounts. mooLa is safe and secure, and unlike other financial apps, does not require sensitive banking information. Key features: • Track all your money and bills in one place • Receive bill due date reminders • Password lock • Get important account notifications • View detailed bill & account statements • Add an unlimited number of accounts • Customizable categories • View spending habits by category, subcategory, and payee • Data import/export/backup • Enjoy well deserved financial peace of mind GET OUT OF DEBT! mooLa helps you keep track of your money and bills, giving you a simple overview of your cash, bills, and credit card debt. Once you understand what you owe, you can find ways to budget your money better. Control your spending and bills due with transaction history, and never miss a bill with push notifications. STOP OVERDRAFTING Stop giving away your hard earned money to your bank! Banks hold your real account balance hostage in the hopes of charging you outrageous overdraft fees because you failed to manage your money properly. Don't use an app that downloads information from your bank, as it will not have accurate real-time information about your accounts. Credit/debit card purchases could take days to post to your accounts, and if you live on a tight budget you run great risk of overdrafting and shelling out big bucks to your bank. ======== NOTES =================== THE TRANSFER FEATURE IS NOT MISSING FROM THE APP. Long click an account, the updown arrows is transfer. The widget is being worked on right now, it will be back in the next release.
release_text: Added Save & Next feature for adding new transactions. Fixed Bill Reminders. Changed the way the app handles Credit accounts.

Halloween Match Three is a simple "match three" puzzle game dressed up in Halloween colours and music. The gameplay is simple as always: switch two elements to get a line of three or more items. Don't let the spider-web grow over your game field. And the faster you play - the higher are the scores. Apply your tactical skills in "Survival" mode or race against the time in "Time trial". Either way we hope you enjoy this Halloween game.

description: Pro Version ** without ** ads ** Please try the free version first ** Camera Gif Creator allows you to create animated images (GIF) using the camera or pictures you already have on your mobile. Once you have chosen your settings you can block them. Just press the menu button or touch the sub menu in the top bar and check "Block Settings". Press the camera icon and make the photos that you want. If your camera application has the burst option please try it. Once you're done press the back button and the Gif will be created in seconds. The gallery below displays GIFs. Hold down the image to view it. In the gallery you can select other photos and create more GIFs. Just choose the order and click the button creation. You also have the options delete and share. Browse inside the gallery thanks to the explorer bar and the back button. If you want to go to the settings screen just press the back icon on the top bar. ---------------- FAQ: - When I back from camera does not create GIF! Try to exit the application and re-enter. It is also possible that your phone is in low memory and "kill" the photo detector. - I can not find my GIFS! Generally GIFs are stored on your SD card or internal memory in the folder "Pictures/CameraGifCreator" - When I try to view a GIF, application stops! Surely the GIF either too large for your mobile. Select it, press to share and mail for viewed. - I can not see properly the images in the gallery! The first time you go into a folder with images may take awhile. Be patient. The charging time depends on the size of the images to load. - Where is my SD card in Gallery! I'm lost! Usually in /root/mnt/scard and camera shots in DCIM. - When I share my GIFS via Whatsapp or Line I can not play them! Whatsapp and Line reencode all the images that you send. It's not my fault. ---------------- Thanks for buy/try this app. Atre. www.atredroid.net

You can configure tweet format and more. Tag your music files properly! At least Artist and Song name. *Music players supported: Android based players (like Apollo), Google Play Music and Rdio*

**** Please if you like the application considers the option to purchase the Pro version, no ads. Thank you very much! **** Convert your videos into funny GIFs! Load a video or create a new one, then select a time range, beginning and ending. You can view the preview for the time selected. Remember 1 second is 1000 milliseconds. Keep it mind that you're using a mobile device and memory and other resources are limited. You can view the gif specs at the end of the main window. When gif is created touch and hold for view it in the gallery. Press Menu -> About for more info **ATENTION** This is a beta version yet and maybe it is not running in your device. Please let me know via mail your device model and video type that you're trying to load. Thank you. I suggest these settings (depends of your device): -Quality: 25% -Size: max 320x240 -Gif duration: max 4 seconds -Frames number: max 80 *Avoid vertical videos* **How to deal with out of memory issue? Try to use the settings above. If it does not works you can try to lower Frame Rate. Frame Rate is set from the video loaded and is the most important spec because gives to the gif the smooth movement. But I suggest you lower time range, size or quality before. Feel free to test. **Where are my GIFs? Into your sdcard (or internal memory) folder Pictures/VideoToGif With my phone (LG optimus L5) I created gifs of 3-4 megs. For any suggestions send me an email. Thanks for trying this app.
release_text: Version 1.4b - Adds rotate image in gif visor - Fixes minor bugs

description: *** This app does not work correctly with Android 4.4 (KitKat). *** Google changed the way timers work in KitKat, breaking the app. Please do NOT download this app if you are running Android 4.4 (KitKat) until I update it with a fix! The Run/Walk Intervals Timer (Timer) is a quick and easy way to enjoy your run/walk interval training while listening to music, enjoying the scenery, enjoying the company of others, and/or recording your run via GPS ... but NOT worrying about keeping track of your intervals. The Timer keeps track of those intervals for you! (The scenery, company of others and GPS NOT included ☺ ) After opening the application, set your desired times and intervals and press Start. The Timer keeps track of the time for each interval, how many intervals you have completed, and the overall time you have spent in the activity. When an alarm directs you to transition, the Timer will: sound ON: - Mute any music - Vibrate the phone (if selected) - Tell you to run, walk or cool down (as appropriate) - Return the music back to its original level sound OFF: - Vibrate the phone (if selected) - Display a note instructing you to run, walk or cool down (as appropriate) - During a phone conversation, the Timer will react to an alarm as if the sound is OFF. The conversation is not interrupted in any way. You can also use other applications without error while the Timer is running - all audible alarms will be played (sound ON) or notes will be displayed (sound OFF). For example, I use the Timer, Pandora, and My Tracks for testing. After starting the Timer you can Stop it. Once it is stopped, you are free to either Reset the application back to the default choices or Resume the training values previously setup. Resuming will begin everything exactly where you stopped it at with no loss of information or time. General application settings are available at Menu | Settings. It contains options for Text-To-Speech, Interval Announcements and the Vibrator. Select specific run settings on the Timer's main page by clicking on the appropriate edit or toggle button. Toggle buttons: - Toggle a warm up interval on or off - Toggle to run first or walk first (both the Running and Walking toggle buttons function like this) - Toggle to choose a specific number of interval sets or continue indefinitely - Toggle a cool down interval on or off Edit buttons: - Select the interval for the associated item - The 'Stop after' edit button allows you to select how many run / walk intervals you want prior to run completion or the cool down interval firing. If the sound does NOT work: The Timer uses Android's 'Notifications' audio stream so you must set the sound level for notifications on your phone: - While at the phone's home screen, click on the Menu button, then Settings. - In the Settings screen, click on the Sound category. - Click on the 'Volumes' or 'Set audio volume' entry. The entry may be different on your phone, you are looking for the 'Notifications' audio stream control. - Set the Notifications audio stream to its maximum. (Personally, I just max out all the audio volumes.) - There may also be a checkbox labeled "Use incoming call volume for notifications". If checked, RWI will use the incoming call volume instead of the notification volume. If you check it or leave it checked, set the incoming call volume to its maximum. - Your device may differ slightly from these instructions, but they should be close. - Click the back button until you get back to your Home screen. - Start the Timer and the sound should work properly. Thank you for using Run / Walk Intervals Timer and I hope it helps you to meet your fitness goals.
release_text: - Moved the the setup for Interval Sets to the Main page from the Cool Down setup page. - Refactored how RWI uses Google Analytics & updated it to GA v2.0 beta 5. - Updated Google AdMob Ads SDK to v6.4.1. - Refactored how RWI creates & uses the 4 different notifications - Warmup, Run, Walk, & Cool Down. - Removed Crittercism and ACRA & the READ_LOGS (read sensitive log data) permission they needed. - Bug fixes.

description: С помощью приложения «Баланс близких» вы можете самостоятельно следить за состоянием мобильных счетов других абонентов «МегаФона» – членов вашей семьи, друзей или знакомых. Виджет приложения можно разместить на рабочем столе вашего смартфона, и баланс телефонов близких вам людей всегда будет у вас на виду. При необходимости на экран можно вынести несколько виджетов для разных контактов. Если баланс близкого вам человека приближается к нулю, с помощью виджета вы сможете пополнить его «одним касанием». Также прямо с экрана смартфона можно позвонить близкому человеку, кликнув на виджет. Функционал приложения доступен только для абонентов Столичного филиала. With the application "Balance close" you can keep track of the state of the mobile accounts of other subscribers of "Megaphone" - the members of your family, friends or acquaintances. Application widget can be placed on the desktop of your smartphone, and the balance phones close to you will always be in your mind. If necessary, the screen can make multiple widgets for different contacts. If the balance of a loved one is close to zero, with a widget you can fill it "one-touch". Also, right from the smartphone can call a friend, click on the widget. The functional application is available only to subscribers of the Metropolitan Branch.

description: #### Important ### Since this app is more a pilot study than a real product I worked on Tampermonkey for Dolphin browser quite a while and found recently the time to bring it into a beta state. You can get it from here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.tampermonkey.dolphin #### Description ### Tampermonkey is a Greasemonkey compatible script manager. There are extensions for Chrome and Chromium and now there as an app for Android. In order to make your Userscripts run, Tampermonkey is wrapped by a small Android app that is something like a browser. Please note that Tampermonkey for Android is still in beta state and that it doesn't have the feature set of a full-blown browser like Chrome or Firefox for Android. ### Requirements ### * 512+ MB RAM * a dual-core CPU is recommended ### Debugging ### * use 'adb logcat' to get the Tampermonkey and Userscript console messages ### Features ### * manage and edit all your Userscripts * enable and disable your scripts with 2 clicks * all GM_* functions including (GM_registerMenuCommand, GM_getResourceText, GM_getResourceURL, GM_notification) * full unsafeWindow access * a lot of tags supported by Greasemonkey and Scriptish (like @resource, @require, ...) For a full overview please take a look at the FAQ or just install TM. ;) Thanks for using Tampermonkey. :)

Play "Puzzle screen" and "Dig up screen"! "Puzzle screen" 　Restoration work Put the collected fossil panels in order correctly. "Dig up screen"　Dig up and collect Break rock panels by Tap. Discover all fossil panels and　take them to the Puzzle screen. Challenge the hard level ! Two type of fossils are mixed on the levels 3 and 4. You can play many kinds of Dinosaurs fossils! - Season1 dinosaurs - Parasaurolophus,Pteranodon,Elasmosaurus,Spinosaurus,Triceratops,Velociraptor,Maiasaura,Tyrannosaurus,Ankylosaurus,Mosasaurus,Stegosaurus,Archaeopteryx,Ceratosaurus,eoraptor,Shonisaurus,Dimetrodon - Season2 dinosaurs - Diplodocus,Allosaurus,Amargasaurus,Argentinosaurus,Carnotaurus,Dilophosaurus,Iguanodon,Oviraptor,Quetzalcoatlus,Polacanthus,Pachycephalosaurus,Styracosaurus - Season3 dinosaurs - Megalosaurus,Tarbosaurus,Deinonychus,Microraptor,Jobaria,Lambeosaurus,Pinacosaurus,Protoceratops,Futabasaurus,Rhamphorhynchus

description: Turn on/off settings on your phone right from your home screen including the battery level Full list of settings you can change / toggle: - Airplane mode - GPS - Bluetooth - Wi-Fi - Silent and vibrate mode - Auto-rotate screen - Brithness - Background data (2G/3G) - Data Roaming - Battery level

Softball Coaching Drills. For new or seasoned youth softball coaches. Softball Drill Mate app. helps you create a youth softball practice that your players will want to keep coming back to. Perfect for the coach on the go. Not sure what to practice? Let the "Droid Drill Spinner" pick a drill for you. Will it be a fun game or a fitness activity ? Only the "Droid Drill Spinner" knows. With over 30 drills and activities, your team will never get bored. Or simply scroll down the drill list and pick an activity that matches the skill you want to work on. Hitting, base running, outfield drills etc. Need Coaching Points ? Press the "Coaching Points" button and BAM. Some softball coaching points to help make your practices effective.

Code Generator is a time based code generation app for faceboook. It creates a unique login code every 30 seconds, even when you aren't connected to the internet, so you always have a code when you need one. If you have login approvals turned on, you can use Code Generator instead of waiting for a text message with your login code. How to use: Open your facebook account on your personal computer and go to settings->security setup code generator. Or you may go to this link http://on.fb.me/1dTEf8n or http://is.gd/codegen and setup code generator. Use the secret key from facebook to Add Secret in the Code Generator app. Please note that, for successful code generation your device clock need to be in correct time and date and also set to correct time zone.

【 Game manual 】 This app is a brain training game that stores a number that is displayed for a moment. 【 Moment memory 】 Memory is the capability which memorizes the number seen for a short time, a figure, etc. at the moment. Many information is memorizable at once by memorizing information not as a numerical value or a character but as a picture. 【 Tips on moment memory 】 Left brain verbal memory. Right brain image storage. A game uses the right brain.

app_name: パチスロ 主役は銭形２ オリンピア
description: 2014年2月より全国一斉導入されたオリンピアの人気パチスロ機種。 パチスロ『主役は銭形2』がAndroidアプリで配信開始!! ≪注意事項≫ ・Xperia系の端末でBGM音量が大きい場合、端末設定＞音設定＞「xLOUD」OFF、をお試しください。 ・本アプリのデータ容量は約1.5GBとなっております。ダウンロードにはWi-Fi使用を強く推奨します。 ・外部ストレージ（端末によっては内部ストレージ）に約1.5GBの空き容量が必要になります。 ・本アプリは実機と異なる機能が含まれておりますが、実機で同様の機能を使用できるわけではありません。 ・実機と異なる演出・挙動をする場合があります。 ・演出や音声など実機のクオリティに近づけるため、端末にかなりのスペックを要求します。対応機種でも動作にカクつきが生じる場合がございます。 ・他アプリとの同時起動（ライブ壁紙やウィジェット等）は避けてください。アプリの動作が不安定になる場合があります。 ・アプリのダウンロード中に電波状況等で切断された場合、データの取得が初めからになる可能性があります。 ・本アプリは縦画面専用となります。（横画面への切替はできません） ・強制終了などが発生する場合には、端末の再起動やソフトウェアアップデートが最新に更新されている事をご確認ください。 ◆対応機種について◆ 対応機種以外はアプリの動作保証外とし、全てのサポート対象外となります。 ご購入前にお使いの機種が対応機種一覧に含まれるかご確認ください。 http://go.commseed.net/go/?pcd=zenigata2 ご購入頂いたアプリはGooglePlayが提供するキャンセルサービスにより購入取り消しが可能です。詳しくは下記URLにて内容をご確認ください。 http://support.google.com/googleplay/bin/answer.py?hl=ja&answer=134336&topic=2450225&ctx=topic アプリ内アイテムのキャンセルは行えませんので、予めご了承ください。 ≪アプリ紹介≫ 【POINT1】専用筐体「逮捕」をアプリで再現！ 逮捕シャッター、サーチライト、ビクトリーパトなどの可動役物を完全再現!! 【POINT2】フルボイス＆全楽曲を搭載！ 実機に登場するキャラクター達はフルボイス！さらに全楽曲が最初から選択可能!! 【POINT3】実機の演出は完全網羅！ ルパンシリーズには欠かせない「タイプライタ」をはじめ、実機の演出を全て搭載!! 【POINT4】液晶画面の拡大機能に対応！ ご要望の多かった「液晶画面拡大」に対応！切り替えは液晶部分をタップするだけ!! 【POINT5】プレイデータを詳細に記録!! 小役回数やボーナス当選率など、多項目に渡るプレイデータをいつでも閲覧可能!! 【オリンピアについて】 スロットファンに人気の「ルパン三世」「アントニオ猪木」「戦国乙女」各種シリーズをはじめ、麻雀物語、キャッツ･アイ、ゴルゴ13など人気のパチスロ機種を提供する企業です。 【コムシードについて】 オリンピア公式携帯サイト『パーラーオリンピア』の運営の他、オリンピア人気機種のスマートフォンアプリを配信。 また、他メーカーの「パチスロモンスターハンター月下雷鳴」「パチスロバイオハザード5」「パチンコミニミニモンスター」等のアプリを配信する企業です。 その他、グリパチ等の各種ソーシャルゲーム運営も行っています。 【主役は銭形２はこんな人にオススメ】 ・携帯(けいたい)スマートフォンで遊べるスロットアプリを探している人 ・パチスロが好きな人 ・ルパン3世シリーズが好きな人 ・スロットマシン・パチンコなどをホールでも楽しむ人 ・パチスロの実機シミュレーター(シミュレーター)を探している人 ・グリパチを楽しんでいるユーザー ・オリンピアのファン ・ルパン3世シリーズをホールでも遊んでいた人 ◆よくあるご質問◆ お問い合わせいただく前に、以下の内容をご確認ください 1. ダウンロードが開始されない。 →決済不具合の可能性があります。 　ご利用の決済サービス（Googleもしくは通信キャリア）へお問い合わせください。 　Google社のお問い合わせ窓口 　 http://support.google.com/googleplay/bin/request.py?hl=ja&contact_type=market_phone_tablet_web 2. 接続待機中と表示され進まない。 →「Wi-Fi接続時にのみダウンロードする」をチェック選択した状態でダウンロードを開始し、Wi-Fi接続されていない場合に起こります。 　一旦キャンセルしてチェック選択を外してから、再度ダウンロードしてください。 3. アプリの再ダウンロードについて 　同一アカウントであれば、無償で何度でもダウンロード可能です。 4. 非動作確認端末の対応予定について 　アプリの動作に充分な性能を有していない端末につきましては、動作確認端末に含まれないケースもございます。 　尚、個別のご案内は原則致しかねますので予めご了承ください。 ◆アプリに対するお問い合わせ◆ アプリがインストールできない、プレイ中の不具合などのお問い合わせの際、 下記URLよりサポートアプリ（無料）のご利用を推奨しています。 スムーズに問題を解決するため、是非ともご利用ください。 http://go.commseed.net/go/?pcd=supportapp [JASRAC許諾番号] 9009535049Y43030 (C) モンキー･パンチ / TMS･NTV

description: Doctor Who sounds and ringers was created for the whovian in all of us. Long press to save as (ringtone,notify,alarm) New APK total code re-write for android 4.0+, now fully backwards compatible This application is Free, but Ad supported, Find a bug? Submit under Menu > feedback. Please support Doctor Who series and buy from BBC, and BBC America web stores.
release_text: New Version 5.0 released. Combines version 3.0 GB, 4.6 GB, 4.5 ICS/JB, into a new version, introducing version 5.1 Now better support for all platforms with single source code. Allows for faster updates, and backwards compatible We are aware of some users not able to keep ringtones after reboot. This is a known android issue, please see this for more info http://goo.gl/qvG3r

description: A small utility that lets you download any shared link on your phone. This can solve the pesky problem where an app doesn't give you any options for downloading a link! The app has no launcher; it just shows up in share menus when you try to share a link. Attribution: Launcher "arrow" designed by Calvin Goodman ( http://www.thenounproject.com/calpoog ) from the Noun Project.
release_text: Fixed a crasher when supplying invalid links to the app.

description: Tired of GIFs taking forever to load on poor connections? This should help your situation! Opening gifs with Gfycat converts them to video first, lowering your bandwidth usage and increasing performance. This app is open source! Check it out here: https://github.com/dlew/android-gfycat/
release_text: Real talk: There are no differences in this update that are for you. It's all for me. I changed the internal code around because it was ugly. It's turned into a beautiful swan now, but frankly you won't notice that since it (should) run the same as ever.

description: Transparent Calendar Widget lets you see your calendar events on the home screen without opaque backgrounds that blocks your beautiful wallpaper. It's also possible to add it to your lock screen in Android 4.2. The widget will show events of the visible calendars in the default calendar app. Change the calendars in the app to change what should be visible in the widget. The colors at the left of the text shows what calendar the event comes from. GUI for Customization and choosing calendars is now under development!
release_text: 1.1.6: Fixed bug where dates wasn't parsed as UTC. 1.1.7: Fixed bug where all day events showed time. 1.1.8: Bugfix: Now parsing the event dates by the events' own time zone. 1.1.9: Bugfix: Added UTC for events that doesn't have timezones.

description: WorldMessage: “Use Your Language In The World”. WorldMessage is a cross-platform mobile instant messaging app which allows you to exchange messages, messages automatically translated, videos, photo and create group without having to pay for SMS, simply using your network 3G/4G tariff plan or Wi-Fi. You may communicate in an automatic way with other users all over the world, without knowing any language, simply by choosing your own one during the installation on your device. There are 64 languages and more than 4000 combinations. You can also choose to set a password to enter the App and to pre-set a chat duration time, to the end of which no data will be available on your phone anymore. Functionality: • Instant Messaging with automatic translator • Share photos, videos and position • Chat groups • Push notification • Password to enter the app • Pre-Set a chat duration time • Set your profile

LeMat Revolver is probably the best revolver simulator in the Android Market today! - Lock, unlock, load, fire and spin chamber like in real single-action revolver! - Fire by your finger or by shaking your phone. - Turn your LeMat to automatic pistol (unrealistic) and shoot your opponents like with AK-47! ;) Western is back. Get ready your gun, cowboy! This is the first version of the app and I'm open for suggestions. Do you want some feature? Write me an e-mail or leave me a comment! I would appreciate for any feedback. Thanks!

Steer, ride and zoom across the ground in Motocross Rider for your Android device! Your bike is oiled, your tires have been pumped - the ride is waiting - are you ready? Play as an extreme Motocross Rider as you drive across the harsh terrain and hop over the vast obstacles that lay in your path! In this 2D motocross game, you must use your agility and skill to ride through different worlds of ranging difficulties. Using onscreen controls, you must maneuver your dirt bike across harsh terrain. From Ecler Studios, this addictive, extreme game will keep you entertained for hours on end as you beat your previous track time and gain new achievements as you become the master of two wheels! Your dirt bike roars in the wind, the Motocross Rider is at your command. Touch the A and B buttons to accelerate and decelerate. Hit the left and right buttons to tilt - now it’s easy for anyone to take the handlebars! In Motocross Rider, you can take control of various, high-speed dirt bikes - each with roaring power, all at your fingertips! There are 8 different bikes, including the classic dirt bikes, quads and loads more! We also have 2 premium, exclusive bikes: the scooter and the chopper - to add even more fun into the game! Explore the various worlds on different bikes as you gain new achievements! Race your previous track times and aim for the top of the global leaderboards! Motocross Rider includes 3 various, interesting worlds: the first of the three worlds is a forest, this rough terrain is full of natural obstacles that you will have to pass, tilt and accelerate over! The second world is the junkyard; filled with construction equipment, this challenging world will put you and your dirt bike to the ultimate test! The third is the winter world, filled with logs and snow, this world will keep you on the edge of your seat! We are constantly adding new worlds, so stay tuned... we will shortly be adding 2, totally new, exciting worlds including the moon and dessert! Join the challenging, exciting world, as you drive to survive - in Motocross Rider! Features - Use onscreen controls to maneuver the bike! - Explore the beautiful, exciting 2D worlds! - Keep entertained with hours of addictive gameplay - Try all 10 different bikes, including the scooter and chopper! - 23 intriguing Swarm achievements! - 6 Swarm leaderboards (5 for every world time + 1 for best total game time)! Powered by AndEngine.

description: Do you love the starry night? Do you want to know everything in the sky? Star Rover is the fantastic planetarium for your smart phone. Just hold up your phone and Star Rover will tell you exactly what you are pointing at. Star Rover determines your location automatically. You'll see the stars, moon, planets, constellations in their proper place from your current location. As you move your phone, the star map updates in real time. Star Rover makes the virtual sky a gorgeous view. You can see star twinkling, beautiful nebulae, occasional meteor and even sunset glow in the evening. Star Rover is very easy to use. You can simply change the sky view in settings and use pinch-to-zoom gesture for everything you want to know in the night sky. Features - Over 120,000 stars. - All 88 constellations with beautiful artworks. - Planets and their moons with stunning graphics. - Moon phases. - Real images of nebulae (Messier catalogue). - Sky objects information. - Realistic Milky Way. - Star twinkling. - Equatorial and azimuthal grids. - Realistic atmosphere, sunrise and sunset. - Eclipse simulation. - Sky view underneath the horizon. - Time setting and animation. - Manually location setting. - Point and view.

description: WAYALIFE.com is a website and forum dedicated to all Jeeps and the Jeep way of life. Here, we feature videos, photos and trail reports from all our off road adventures. You will also find a great community of fellow Jeep fanatics ranging from the old CJ, YJ and TJ Wrangler to the all new JK Wrangler and various other models such as the XJ Cherokee, Grand Cherokee and more. Our Android App makes it easy for you to see what we?re up to as well as provide easy access to our forum, right from the palm of your hand. description: Shanghai Places is filled with over 8000 big, bold-faced addresses in Chinese that show you or Taxi drivers exactly where you want to go (Address in Chinese, English and google map). Perfect for those visiting the city for the first time, or for those that call Shanghai home. You can also display the place localization on a Google Map! FEATURES: ✓ Fast & Easy ✓ Taxi Cards: Just hold up your phone - the big, bold addresses in Chinese tell the driver exactly where you want to go. No more charades and no more getting lost! ✓ Offline: you don't need an internet connection to browse the listings! ✓ Updates: you can download the database updates directly from the app ✓ Maps: you can display the place on a map (needs Google/Baidu Maps installed on your device) ✓ Sharing: you can share any addresses with your friends (SMS, Mail, Weixin, Whatsapp...) ✓ Manage your favorites places ✓ Free

description: Follow the Pro Baseball live scores without taking your phone out of your pocket. When there is a point, the phone vibrates the amount of points. For example, if the game is 4-2, your phone will vibrate like this: buzz, buzz, buzz, buzz , , buzz, buzz The scores are now spoken. You will hear a voice saying "four" - "two" Cheer your favorite team by pressing cheers buttons :)

HSS is the first MMO RT TBS (Real Time Turn Based Strategy) game. Like a lot of TBS games, the goal is to conquer the world. This game could be considered as a mix of Travian and Civilization. Every player plays their turns at the same time. You have (2) hours hours to make all your moves before the next turn. Since everybody makes their moves at the same time, you need to hurry as soon as the turn starts or someone may take your place :)... Features in the game - 8 different units and much more coming soon - from swordsman to jet fighters - Gigantic world (currently 400x400 tiles). - 2 hour turns so you can take your time to play - 1 nice sound effect - Messaging system where you can contact your friends & enemies - Ranking feature where you can see how your leaders compare - A registering process so your account in always backed-up. - In-game instructions to help you understand the game Note that this game is in a "beta" version and maintained by a team of 3 persons AND ITS FREE so be kind with your comments. Since its in "beta" mode, any comments and/or suggestions are greatly appreciated. Bugs can happen so please don't get mad at us if you see strange things happening. And finally, of course it will be a pleasure for us to help you if anything happens. If you have any comments/suggestions please contact us at hss@fighttime.net Thank you!

I own app to Strong Motion Monitor the site found in the National Research Institute for Earth Science and Disaster Prevention, Japan. The URL hard-coded, such as might not see the site design changes. Notification has been modified to send the earthquake occurrence of new Strong Motion Monitor site. There notification sound in the first report, will be sent without notification sound in the final report. In the menu button, settings / screen shots / image sharing / display history. In the settings, items that can be set are: • Sleep off enable / disable • Notification enable / disable • Background map white / black • Main(Left) map type settings • Sub(Right) map type settings • Server synchronization offset time • Strong motion monitoring server selection Portrait screen display during operation the following is possible. • At the slide bar in the lower-left corner, past data up to 1 hour show • In the slider bar left or right button (also on hold can be varied continuously) move data before and after the second (previous monitor is 2 seconds) • When showing past data return to the current time data show in the bottom right button press It can be changed tha map type by the swipe. A screenshot image stores into "/sdcard/data/net.hirozo.KiKNetViewPkg/".

Privacy Scanner Antispy Free: A free mobile anti spyware tool Free mobile spy protection for your smartphone. Are you being spied by your boss, (boy/girl) friend, spouse or friends? Privacy Scanner Antispy was created to check your smartphone whether you are really being spied on. It detects ParentalControl and surveillance apps, which might be misused to spy on spouses, using GPS-Track technologies, receive and send sms, read your contacts, read your call history, reads your calendar and so on... Check your smartphone with this app whether you are being spied on. As of 2015-07-11 Privacy Scanner detects more than 2,000 Spy and Surveillance apps! Features: + Detects SpyBubble, eBlaster Mobile, UonMap Spy, parental control apps and many more surveillance apps + Scans for apps using suspicious permissions (like reading SMS, reading your profile, read your contacts and so on) + Optionally scan using heuristics + Search for apps using analytics (like. GoogleAnalytics) to retreave more information about you + More detailed description of found spy/spyware app + Possibility to report an app as safe + Free protection against spy apps + Detect apps listed as Device Administrator + Customize if you want to include popular apps + Uninstall any found malware inside this app + Add apps to your whitelist and remove apps from your whitelist + Simple design + Change language to English, German, Spanish, Portugese or French + No permissions required + Updates using Playstore + Regular updates + Please activate automatic updating for Privacy Scanner Free What is the difference between the Pro version and the Free version? The following features are included in the Pro version: + Daily background scheduled scanning (Pro version only) + InDepthScan-Technology to detect more spy apps and more analytics (Pro version only) + Advanced heuristic engine v2.0, to detect more new and unknown spy apps and spyware apps (Pro version only) + Advanced heuristic engine v2.0, to detect malicious apps pretending to be a system service (Pro version only) + Priority updates (Pro version only) + More updates than the free version (Pro version only) + Shows date and time of the last scan. (Pro version only) + Search for unsecure phone settings (Pro version only) + Support the ongoing development (Pro version only) Help/FAQ: http://lighthouse-antispy.blogspot.com/2014/10/faq.html Unfortunately, we are yet no big company ;), so answering emails may take up to 2-3 weeks. Thank you for your understanding. This app is not an anti virus program, but it intents to detect spyapps and so called spyware. It is a surveillance detector and spy detector. This app is provided by lighthouse, formerly known as HobbyApplications. ################ Please note! Sometimes, after you install this app the language may not be set to English by default. If this is the case please navigate to 'Einstellungen' then go to 'Sprache' then select 'English' and then click on 'Speichern'. Now, you should restart the app to take full effect. Thus, after you got the main screen click on 'Beenden' and then start the app again.

description: REQUIRES WORKING SUPERUSER ON DEVICE SoftKeys provides on screen virtual keys for some required keys for normal android functionality. It was created for devices lacking regular physical keys to provide input for the Home, Menu, Back, and Search buttons. SoftKeys can run as a home screen replacement or as an on-screen service hovering over all applications. It can also be used on devices where users may consider the physical keys fragile, such as the HTC HD2. Designed originally for the Color Nook but also works on the Pandigital Novel, HTC HD2, etc

description: Track and control weight change at a glance! Premium features! Simple use! Sophisticated design! All of these have been made carefully for women everywhere. Simply enter your daily weight on Supreme Weight Control to track your weight change. View daily change, weekly change, and monthly change in detail and recent weight change, daily weight change, average weekly weight change, and average monthly weight change are calculated automatically to show on a list and graph to help you achieve your goal in terms of weight loss, fitness, weight control, and healthy life. All inputs are simply made with a touch of a button and all features for weight control are provided systematically. The easy user interface and instructions are self-explanatory, the sophisticated and comfortable design with all information provided at a glance, and the privacy password feature for women make it really attractive! ※ Major Features ◆ Weight - Enter and correct weight every day. - View BMI and rating. - View current weight in comparison to target weight. - View daily change, weekly change, and monthly change. - The memo feature for daily diary. - Open the calendar to mark a date. ◆ Statistics - View recent trends in weight change on a list or graph. - View trends in daily weight change on a list or graph. - View trends in average weekly weight change on a list or graph. - View trends in average monthly weight change on a list or graph. ◆ Settings - Set gender (male/female). - Set current height. - Set target weight. - Set BMI raiting system. - Set password. - Run Backup feature. - Run Restore feature.

Members of The Home Depot SmartCare network with can use this free app to find doctors, hospitals, clinics and urgent care facilities on the go. The app uses your location to help you find nearby providers in your network, giving you real-time information at your fingertips. SmartCare networks are available in the following areas: • Chicago, IL • Dallas/Ft. Worth, TX • San Antonio, TX • Houston, TX • Beaumont, TX Here's what you can access: • SmartCare hospitals and facilities: Find addresses, maps, estimated drive times and phone numbers for • SmartCare hospitals and facilities. • SmartCare physicians: Find addresses, maps and phone numbers for primary care or specialist physicians. • SmartCare urgent care facilities: Quickly find the closest urgent care center in your network and save yourself from an expensive ER bill. NOTE: Rates from your wireless service provider do apply.

description: This app contains the following lectures: Heart and Pericardium Larynx and Laryngopharynx Posterior Forearm Ankle Joint and Foot Movements Bursae and the Popliteal Fossa Principles of Movements at Joints in the Upper Limb Knee and Unhappy Triad Syndrome THE AUTHOR: Robert Whitaker has spent his clinical career as a paediatric urological surgeon. Since retiring 20 years ago he now teaches clinically applied topographical anatomy to first-year medical students at Cambridge University, in the UK. He also teaches clinically applied anatomy to surgical, radiological and other speciality trainees and is a former examiner for the MRCS at the English and Edinburgh Colleges of Surgeons. NOTE This app is large so make sure you have space on your device.

Anatomy of the Heart In this application you will find the lecture on the Heart and Pericardium from www.instantanatomy.net You can find this lecture with others in our other FREE app Anatomy Lectures The lecture will play and the relevant diagrams will appear in time with the audio. You can zoom in on the images with the pinch gesture as the audio plays. This series of lectures is aimed at anyone who is studying human anatomy. They are ideal for medical or nursing students, biological studies students and physiotherapists or doctors looking to refresh their knowledge. Check out our other applications including lectures on the limbs, embryology and flash cards. The material is presented by Robert Whitaker who has spent his clinical career as a paediatric urological surgeon. Since retiring from surgery he teaches clinically applied topographical anatomy to first-year medical students at Cambridge University, in the UK. He also teaches clinically applied anatomy to surgical, radiological and other speciality trainees and is currently an examiner for the MRCS at the English and Edinburgh Colleges of Surgeons.

Manage yourself. Manage your time. Manage your business. The Management Tip of the Day app from Harvard Business Review offers quick, practical management tips and ideas, delivered right to your phone. The app puts the best management practices and insights, from top thinkers in the field, at your fingertips. Pick it up any time you have a few minutes to spare, and you'll have a fresh, powerful idea you can immediately put into action. Easily share tips via Twitter, Facebook, or email. Push notifications make sure you never miss today's content.
release_text: New design, improved sharing functionality, and push notifications.

description: Find millions of jobs near you in over 55 countries with JobCompass. Ever wondered what jobs are available in your area? Have you been in a city you love and wondered if you could find work and live there? JobCompass can help! JobCompass is the first application on Android that searches millions of jobs, locating and plotting them on a map showing you exactly where the jobs are in relation to a specific address or zip code. Finding a job with JobCompass is simple. When you find a job that you are interested in you can email it to yourself, to a friend and even apply online! So what are you waiting for, find that dream job near you today! Features - Search for jobs as close as 1 mile. - Millions of jobs. - Finds jobs that are located near you instantly in over 55 countries. - Works on any Android device with Edge, 3G or WiFi. - Easy to use and well designed interface. Visit JobCompass.net for an online version and let us know how we can make JobCompass better for your job searches. We also would love to hear about your successful job hunting stories so send them our way. Countries currently supported in JobCompass™: Argentina, Australia, Austria, Bahrain, Belgium, Brazil, Canada, Chile, China, Colombia, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hong Kong, Hungary, India, Indonesia, Ireland, Israel, Italy, Japan, Korea, Kuwait, Luxembourg, Malaysia, Mexico, Netherlands, New Zealand, Norway, Oman, Pakistan, Peru, Philippines, Poland, Portugal, Qatar, Romania, Russia, Saudi Arabia, Singapore, South Africa, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, Taiwan, Thailand, Turkey, United Arab Emirates, United Kingdom, United States, Venezuela, Vietnam

Very addictive and simple in rules puzzle game. The goal of the game is to score as many points as possible. To do this, just move balls on the board to form straight lines in the same color. Once the line is composed of five or more balls they are removed from the board and you score one point for each removed ball. Features: • Tablets support • Google Play Game Services integration • Undo/Redo • Preview of future balls • Three difficulty levels • Resume last played game • Sound Effects and Music
release_text: v.1.2.2 * Licence checking improvements v. 1.2 • A brand new X-mas inspired theme - including new background music. • A nasty bug has been squashed! No more cheating with upcoming balls.

description: 木乃伊、山桜桃、俺足族・・・？ これらの漢字は、なんと読むのでしょう？ 今回こういった難読漢字を１５０問ほど作ってみました。 どうして、こんな漢字を当てるのだろうか？ 無理矢理漢字を当てただけのものなど、 いろいろな難読漢字問題があります。 貴方の、漢字雑学知識を広めるお手伝いができればと思います。 ちょっとした、空き時間の暇つぶしにご利用してみてください。 Mummy, mountain cherry, my foot family ...? Kanji of these, you will read what? I tried to make about 150 questions obfuscation Chinese characters that these this time. Why, I wonder to hit this kind of Chinese characters? Such as those of just relying on Chinese characters by force, There are a variety of obfuscation Kanji problem. And I think if we help to spread your, Chinese characters trivia knowledge. Was a little, please try to use to pass the time of free time.

app_name: たこやきコロタン ～秘密のレシピ～
description: ◆◆◆予想外の累計５０万人突破！！◆◆◆ まさか「たこやき」を育てることになるとは・・・ （26歳女性） たこやきバトルって・・・(゜ロ゜；) （18歳学生） 『たこやきコロタン　～秘密のレシピ～』は、たこ焼をつくることで生まれる妖精コロタンやその仲間たちと一緒にたこやき生活を味わう、ちょびっと変わったお料理＆育成ゲームだよ！ ★リアルにたこ焼つくりましょ！ ３Ｄを使って、たこ焼きのあのコロコロ感を再現！ 思い存分コロコロしちゃってくださいな！ うまくたこ焼をつくると、とっても可愛いたこやき妖精にへーんしーん（変身）！！ ★たこやき妖精そだてましょ！ 生まれたたこやき妖精にごはんを上げたり、きげんをとったりすると、ハッピーポイントが溜まって、妖精はレベルアッープ！ レベルが上げれば進化もしちゃうよ！ ★妖精バトルで腕試し！ あなたの育てた妖精には、いろんなプレイヤーがバトルを仕掛けてくるよ！ しっかり育てて、相手の妖精をやっつけちゃおう！ バトルに勝つとＧＯＬＤや貴重なアイテムが手に入るよ！！ ★たこやき妖精コンプしよ！ タコヤ先生をはじめちょっと変わったキャラクターたちが出すミッションをクリアして、新しい秘密のレシピを手に入れよう！ そして目指すは、たこやき妖精コンプリート！   ◆価格 アプリ本体：無料 ※一部有料アイテムがあります。 ◆その他注意事項 ・セーブについて セーブは自動で行っています。 セーブ中にアプリを終了、または電源を切ると、 セーブデータが破損することがあります。 ゲームを終了するときは、キッチン画面からメニューを選び、その中の「保存して終了」を押して、タイトルに戻ってからアプリを終了するようにしてください。 また、セーブデータ（ゲームのポイント、妖精やそのレベル、ＧＯＬＤ、具材、インテリア等）が、いかなる理由又は原因で破損、もしくは喪失したとしても、保証は致しません。 予め、ご了承の上、ダウンロードをお願いいたします。 ※電池残量が十分にある状態でのプレイを推奨いたします。 ・通信について 本アプリは、ゲームプレイ中に通信を行っており、通信環境の悪いところでは、ゲームをプレイ出来ません。 通信状況の良い場所でプレイをしてください。 ・時刻設定について 本アプリはサーバーと通信することで時刻を取得しており、お持ちの端末の時刻とサーバーとの時刻が異なりますとプレイすることが出来ません。 日付と時刻は、一般設定より自動設定にされることを推奨いたします。 ・不正行為について 本アプリでは、下記のような不正行為を行ったユーザーに対しては、しかるべき制裁措置をとる場合があります。 　不正プログラムを使用する行為 　不正プログラムを制作または配布する行為 　詐欺行為を行い、不適切な利益を得る行為 　不正な方法で、ハッピーポイントやGOLD等を獲得する行為 　ゲーム内バグを悪用する行為 　事実と異なる情報を入力してアカウントを生成する行為 　その他、当社が不正行為と判断する行為 ・その他 本アプリのルール、テキスト、内容等、キャラクターデザイン等、断りなく変更することがあります。 予めご了承の上ダウンロードをお願いいたします。 本アプリは、モデルデータや画像データが多いため、複数のアプリを起動されていますとアプリが突然終了することがあります。 他のアプリを完全に終了させてから本アプリを起動するか、またはメモリの解放を行う等、十分なメモリの確保をされてから本アプリを起動するようにお願いいたします。 特に以前の機種などをご使用の方は、予めご了承の上ダウンロードをお願いいたします。 【お願い】 不具合に関しましては、ゲーム内の「キッチン」画面の左下にある「メニュー」から「オプション」の中の「問い合わせ」からお問い合わせください。 レビューにアップされましても、情報が足りない等の理由から対応が出来ない可能性がございます。 出来る限り、お客様の要望を組み込み、より楽しいゲームを目指したく思っておりますので、ご協力頂ければ幸いです。   ◆対応OS Android 2.2以上の機種でのみ動作致します。 ただし、一部の機種ではご利用になれない場合がございます。 ※タブレットでも動作することを確認しておりますが、本アプリは、モデルデータや画像データが多いため、アプリが突然終了することがありますので、サポート対象外とさせて頂きます。予めご了承の上ダウンロードをお願いいたします。 ※推奨端末以外のサポート、補償等は致しかねますので予めご了承の上ダウンロードをお願いいたします。 release_text: ※バージョン1.1.19 ・一部の端末で、画面上のボタンが隠れてしまう不具合を修正しました。 ※バージョン1.1.18 ・特定条件下で、Androidが5.0以上の端末でアプリが起動しなくなる問題に対策をしました。 ※バージョン1.1.17 ・特定のタイミングでショップに行った後に、ハッピーポイントのランキングに不正確な値が登録される事がある問題を修正しました。 ・コロタンの開発環境のバージョンが上がったため、これ以後はAndroidが2.3.1より前の端末でプレイする事ができなくなります。申し訳ありません。 ※バージョン1.1.16 ・前回の対策後、コロ魔女の表情が見えなくなる問題を修正しました。 ※バージョン1.1.15 ・一部の機種でコロタンの表情が表示されなくなる問題に対策しました。 ※バージョン1.1.14 ・チームバトルの対戦相手リストの反応が、条件によって極度に鈍くなる問題を修正しました。 ※バージョン1.1.13 ・新規にゲームを始めた時に所持金がマイナスになってしまう不具合を修正しました。

description: ◆◆早くも累計６５万ＤＬ突破！◆◆ 初心者でも楽しめるガイド機能付き！ 極上の操作感、溢れる臨場感、圧倒的なクオリティを思う存分お楽しみください。 日常の喧騒を忘れ、ひととき”MIYABI”な時を味わって見ませんか？ *********************************************************** App Storeの各種ランキングで【1位】を獲得!! カードジャンル:【1位】 カジノジャンル:【1位】 *********************************************************** ◆◆連勝コレクション追加！◆◆ 新たに連勝コレクションとしてなんと185枚の浮世絵を追加！ 連勝コレクションは10連勝毎にプレゼントされます！ 10連勝でBランク20連勝でAランク30連勝でSランクと 連勝でのやりこみ度がグンッと上がっています！ 是非連勝を狙ってみてください！ ※40連勝以降はBランクから繰り返されます。 ◆◆祝！累計６０万人記念！！◆◆ 期間の間、通常ライフケース３個のところを ライフケース＋２個の５個でプレイ出来ます。 ※ライフケースを追加購入されている方は ５個＋追加購入分になります。 ★花札の定番ルール「こいこい」を収録！ 花札のルールの中でのもっともスタンダードである「こいこい」を収録しています。 すぐに覚えられ、ちょっとした空き時間にも優雅な大人の遊びを満喫出来ます！ ★リアルな臨場感溢れる花札バトル！ ・札をスライドすることでも場に出すことが出来る直感(フリック)操作! ・いつでもどこでも続きから始められる自動セーブ機能! ・最上級の雰囲気を醸し出す、こだわりのライティング! ★勝負に勝って浮世絵コレクションを手に入れろ！ 一定以上の得点で勝負に勝てば、浮世絵コレクションがもらえます。 より高い得点で勝つほどに、ランクの高いコレクションが手に入ります！ ※連勝していけば、さらに？！ ★ランキング上位を目指せ！ こいこい勝負に勝って獲得したコレクションのポイントや連勝数で他のプレイヤーとランキングで競い合えます。 ◆価格 アプリ本体：無料 ※一部有料アイテムがあります。 ◆その他注意事項 ・セーブについて セーブは自動で行っています。 セーブ中にアプリを終了、または電源を切ると、 セーブデータが破損することがあります。 できるだけ、タイトルに戻ってからアプリを終了するようにしてください。 また、電池残量が十分にある状態でのプレイを推奨いたします。 ・通信について 本アプリは、ゲームプレイ中に通信を行っており、通信環境の悪いところでは、ゲームをプレイ出来ません。 通信状況の良い場所でプレイをしてください。 ・時刻設定について 本アプリはサーバーと通信することで時刻を取得しており、お持ちの端末の時刻とサーバーとの時刻が異なりますとプレイすることが出来ません。 日付と時刻は、一般設定より自動設定にされることを推奨いたします。 ・不正行為について 本アプリでは、下記のような不正行為を行ったユーザーに対しては、しかるべき制裁措置をとる場合があります。 　不正プログラムを使用する行為 　不正プログラムを制作または配布する行為 　詐欺行為を行い、不適切な利益を得る行為 　不正な方法で、ライフ等を獲得する行為 　ゲーム内バグを悪用する行為 　事実と異なる情報を入力してアカウントを生成する等の行為 　その他、当社が不正行為と判断する行為 ・その他 本アプリのルール、テキスト、内容等、デザイン等、断りなく変更することがあります。 予めご了承の上ダウンロードをお願いいたします。 本アプリは、画像データ等が多いため、複数のアプリを起動されていますとアプリが突然終了することがあります。 他のアプリを完全に終了させてから本アプリを起動するか、またはメモリの解放を行う等、十分なメモリの確保をされてから本アプリを起動するようにお願いいたします。 特に以前の機種などをご使用の方は、予めご了承の上ダウンロードをお願いいたします。 ※Android2.3以上の機種でのみ動作致します。 ただし、一部の機種ではご利用になれない場合がございます。 現在タブレット機種はサポート対象外とさせて頂きます。 ※推奨端末以外のサポート、補償等は致しかねますので予めご了承の上ダウンロードをお願いいたします。 ※本アプリのバージョンアップ等に伴って、推奨端末や対応ＯＳのバージョンを変更する場合がございますが予めご了承ください。 ※ＯＳのバージョンアップにより、本アプリに問題が出る場合がございますが予めご了承ください。

description: Mobile Admin for Minecraft allows to you manage your Minecraft server and even chat with other players right from your phone! Paid version adds: - Real time chat - Server control widget - Multi-Server support via login screen (define and save multiple servers) - Interactive server console screen - Online/Offline users listed - User statistics including login time, blocks placed/broken and deaths. - Player skins in list - Multi-User support - Third party plugin support such as Dynmap For more information and to download the MobileAdmin plugin, please visit http://www.kaltner.net IMPORTANT: this application requires you to run your own Minecraft server using Bukkit or hMod (or variants like Canary). Permissions: android.permission.INTERNET Self explanatory. android.permission.WAKE_LOCK The app keeps a wake lock during screen off so it can complete the quit process. android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION This is coarse location, not fine. I use this for basic analytics via Flurry. I can only tell general location from this, not where you live. ;) com.android.vending.CHECK_LICENSE Self explanatory. android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE This is used by the license check to identify the hardware, nothing more. android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE Self explanatory.
release_text: * Renamed the application to Mobile Admin for Minecraft * Fixed an issue with player images (potentially causing large amounts data usage)

Lifting Log tracks your progress on a per-exercise basis. It doesn't need or want to know the days of the week you workout or your name, body weight, height and pictures of your gut like other over-complicated weight training apps. It's simply meant to track your reps/weight progress per exercise (e.g. bench, military press, squat) and even graph your increases for each.

description: Note: This app is still in development Set your alarm to wake up the next day. When the alarm goes off, you will be prompted to speak into your device's microphone and attempt to recall as many details about your dream as possible. Think of the app as leaving a voice mail to yourself. Listen to a playlist of your dream recordings in reality. Over the course of time, you might discover a common occurrence or a pattern. Prior to going to sleep, you might be able to program your mind to continue dreaming where you last left off if you can hear all the details from the last dream Open Source: http://github.com/marklapasa/fleetingdreamrecorder Open Source License: http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0

Do you have problems with concentration? Are you often hyperactive? Then this app might give you the reason for this! Attention Deficit Disorder (ADD) isn't uncommon, between 3-10 percent of all children show signs of ADD. This test was scientifically developed to determine the possibility of an existing ADD. However, the results are not 100 percent proof, although the results are very accurate, if the test is answered truthfully. This is the pro version with over 300 questions and a detailed evaluation. If you want to try this app first check out the lite version in the Play Store. If you find any errors or you have an improvement suggestion just let us know!

description: The same app. but without any ads !

TileFun is a classic slider puzzle or sliding puzzle (Taquin puzzle, also known as 15-Puzzle or Mystic Square), displaying a set of wooden, picture or glass tiles (of any number fitting into a rectangle) that you move into the correct order, providing a very realistic gaming experience and customizable effects for hours of puzzling fun (works for me at least ;-). Notes: - You can play with any picture available on your phone/tablet or use one of the provided (wood, glass) styles or one of the built-in high-res photos. - You can enable any effect individually (e.g. turn the shuffle animation on or off). - TileFun was created for fun of programming Android, so it is free of ads and safe, i.e. it requires (almost (*)) no special permissions. (*) NOTE: With Android 4.4 TileFun does require the permission to "read USB storage" in order to allow playing puzzles with your own photos. You may also NEED to use the built-in Gallery-App for picking your own pictures! TileFun game is optimized for ease of playing with a pleasant, aesthetic appearance. It allows different kinds of playing styles (pure puzzle vs. effects, relaxed playing or beat-your-high-score...). Features: - Realistic rendering and animation: Tiles follow finger precisely (if desired), multiple tiles can be moved at once, handcrafted tile bitmaps for that realism touch. - Various styles: Pure wooden "retro" tiles, glass tiles with user-selected background or classic picture puzzle/photo puzzle (Five hi-quality pics are built-in, but you can use any image from your gallery - camera, download or email). - Game status is saved automagically, you can stop anytime and continue later (or start a new game). - Puzzle size NxM can be changed with each new game, anything from 2x2 to 10x10 (and all intermediate sizes, e.g. 2x3, 6x4, 6x9...) - Customize the game's look, touch and feel according to your preferences, (enable sound, haptic and animation effects - including re-shuffling the tiles by shaking the device - during playing - but only if desired); change the tile style in mid-game. - Switch on the integrated stop-watch/counter to track/beat your best results (saved automatically). - View your high scores and directly start a new NxM game from the high score list (main screen/menu). - TileFun scales from low-res phones to high-res tablets - as a tablet game it is a real eye-catcher due to the large screen and high resolution of today's tablets. It runs on older devices (from Android 1.6) but also on newest tablets like the recent Nexus 7 2013 with Android 4.3 (Jelly Bean) and works fine with both portrait and landscape orientation. - All effects can be turned off - if you prefer realism, play it like a "dumb" slide puzzle... TileFun requires only one "safe" permission (to read-in pictures of your choice) on your phone/tablet and has a small footprint of 2.7MB - including the 5 built-in HD-pictures. It will install on SD-card automatically if you have Android 2.2 or higher. TileFun is ad-free!
release_text: V2.2.3: Fix for Android 4.4 - Sorry folks, now TileFun DOES require a permission (read external storage) ... this is needed when you want to choose your own picture for the puzzle. Earlier Android versions did not need this permission. To choose your own photos, use the built-in gallery app.

description: With the Inspire Bible Verse Widget, popular verses from the King James Version of the Bible are delivered straight to your home screen. Perfect for both phones and tablets. Set your inspiration and let the Inspire Bible Verse Widget select related verses and present them. Simply click on the blue cross to bring up configuration screen to select your inspirational need. Choose from a list including being overwhelmed, needing strength, or dealing with a loss. Be greeted each day with a new verse or tap to see other verses based on your inspiration. Truly appreciate the beauty of the words in the greatest Book ever written. The Inspire Bible Verse Widget overlays on your background and is designed to work with both light and dark backgrounds and shows in semi-transparent view, allowing you to still see your background behind it. Have any ideas to make the widget better or have a favorite verse you'd like to share and have included, please email support@melwin.net . * Some of the backgrounds presented in the screenshots are from the Bible Wallpapers available from Melwin for free.

Repeated Text Messages can be annoying, troublesome, and can hide important messages. Many apps exist to send out massive text messages like TXT Bomb and Text-o-Death. Protect yourself against repeated SMS messages cluttering up your inbox with the Text Bomb Defender. It also protects again carriers re-transmitting the same message over and over due to network issues. It can only protect from carrier re-transmits if you have it installed; unfortunately, it won't protect others who don't. Made by the makers of Melwin Mail and other high quality Android apps, Text Bomb Defender has options to adjust the look back time frame, enable notifications, silence them, and whitelist people in your contacts list. It is truly a set it and forget it background application. Once installed, it will silently protect your text inbox while your phone is on. Blocked messages are stored in a consolidated log that can be viewed and managed straight from the Text Bomb Defender interface. As always, all Melwin Apps are ad-free and spyware free. This application requires permissions to inspect incoming SMS messages and also look up contacts (for whitelisting). No Internet communication or outbound messages are sent and not required. NOTE: Some phones require you to restart the phone before Text Bomb Defender starts to protect you. If you have an questions or requests, please email us at support@melwin.net .

Easily turn any text messaging conversation into a transcript and share it through email, Facebook, or other applications. Options include the ability to limit the message range to a specific period. The intuitive interface allows you to easily see the number of messages in a conversation and select it for export. Limited permissions required for your protection. Text Message Transcript only requires the ability to Read SMS messages and Lookup Contacts (to get proper contact names). Please note that the time displayed are the times as recorded by the Service Provider's time stamp, which in most cases should be your local time, but some providers have chosen to store time in GMT or other standard. LEGAL DISCLAIMER: We make not claim as the suitability of this application for any purpose or use. It is not certified for use in legal discovery or for any related purpose.
release_text: Fixed Force Close issue related to running out of memory on some devices. Tested against 1,000,000 text messages without significant memory growth now.

description: ガチで怖い話！！　その数なんと全1288話！ このアプリは世に流れる約15000の怖い話の中から、ガチで怖い話を中心に、人力で選りすぐった1288話の怖い話を収録！ 使いやすさにこだわり、機能も豊富です。 ・百物語機能 百話ごとにお話しを区切りましたので、百物語にぴったり！ 夜が明けるまでに百物語を読み切り物の怪（モノノケ）に会おう！ ※注意！！ 実際にやる際は９９話でやめるようにしましょう！ アプリ開発者は一切の責任を負いません！ ・未読既読機能 一度読んだ話は色が変わるのでわかりやすい。 ・お気に入り機能 目のアイコンをタップすることで、お気に入りに簡単追加！ ・おすすめ機能 MEZASHIがおすすめする話です。 ・オフライン機能 電波がないところでも読むことが出来ます。 ・話追加機能 自動的に怖い話が追加されていきます。 ・超省電力 電池を消耗する処理を限りなく少なくしました。 ・カテゴリ分け すべての話をカテゴリに分けて、読みたい怖い話がすぐに探せます。 エラーが発生した場合は申し訳ございません。 対処いたしますので、レポートにてご報告いただけますと幸いです。 コメント欄に書かれてもどのようなエラーかこちらではわかりません。 最後まで読んでいただきありがとうございます。 沢山の方に使っていただけると嬉しいです。 気に入っていただけましたら、☆５の評価をお願いいたします。

Hematoloji Camiasının Genç Bireylerinin Paylaşım Grubu Amacımız, dinamizmini hematoloji biliminin dinamizmine paralel olarak yansıtabilecek, özellikle paylaşım eksikliğinin bulunduğu ülkemiz bilim ortamına paylaşımcı bir yaklaşımı benimseyip- benimsetebilecek hematologları bir çatı altında sosyal medyanın da bütünleştirici etkisinden faydalanarak toplamaktır. Grubumuzun ismindeki genç kelimesi hiçbir şekilde yaş ile ilintili değil aksine amatör ruhla profesyonel işler yapabilecek başarabilecek potansiyeli kendinde gören hematologları betimlemektedir. Hem fiziki şartlar hem de gündelik yaşamın zorlukları nedeni ile yeteri düzeyde iletişemeyen hematologların bir paylaşım alanı, kolaylıkla iletişebilinecek ortak bir sanal yaşam alanı olsun istedik. Bu sanal ortam sizlerin de katkısı ile büyüyecek ve belki de hematoloji adına önemli adımların atılmasına sebep olacaktır. Şimdiden bütün emeği geçen ve geçecek meslektaşlarımıza saygılar sunar özgür bir iletişim ağı olan “genç hematologlar” grubuna hoş geldiniz der kıymetli paylaşımlarınızı bekleriz.

<> Very simple analog clock widget, supports second hand. It's easy-to-read on your home. <>Though it has second hand, battery consumption is low. The clock will be stopping while the screen is off. <> You can change some clockface settings, so surely it will match your home screen. <> Widget size: 1x1, 2x2, 3x3 If your Android is 3.1 or higher, you can resize after set to the home. ------------------------------------------------------------- NOTE: - This app is WIDGET. After install, you must put it on your home from the widget list. - In rare case, widgets will not be added to the list. This is a problem of Android. In this case, re-install the app or reboot the phone. - Immediately after the phone screen ON, the load of the OS is high. Therefore the second hand may not work smoothly. This is not a problem of app. Please wait a little until it begins to move. - After you choosed "Open Alarm setting" on "Tap action" setting, you will not be able to open the preference of this app. When you want to change settings, put the widget on your home again, or reboot your phone. Then you can open the preference only once. - There are phones that does not sleep during charging. In this case, because even during charging continues to move second hand, it might seem like this app is consuming the battery. Usually it does not consume much battery. ------------------------------------------------------------- [Settings] - Use second hand - Color of second hand - Show hour numbers - Change number text size - Show hour and minute marks - Use clockface background - Inverse color - Drawing quality etc.
release_text: NEW: NEW: v3.5.1 - Fixed small bugs. v3.5.0 - Added "Tap Action" option. You can use Alarm setting on tapping. - Improved some problems and stability. v3.0.1-3.1.5 - Supported Android 5.1. - Added "Show hour numbers" "Show hour marks" and "Show minute marks" options. NOTE: - This app is WIDGET. After install, you must put it on your home from the widget list. - In rare case, widgets will not be added to the list. It's a problem of Android. In this case, re-install widgets or reboot your phone.

description: The LCD for Arduino app will allow you to create custom LCD characters for your Arduino projects. Are you tired of the boring common characters and want your project to stand out from the others? Then this is for you. It features three different colors (blue, green, and yellow), an easy way to save your creations to your device, load them from the device, and even share them via email. The app automatically generates Arduino C code that is ready to paste into your Arduino software, compile, and display your custom creations with ease. LCD for Arduino is not sponsored by or affiliated with Arduino.

Upload your pictures to imgur. Features: * Keeps a list of images you have uploaded so you can easily share them. * Keeps track of the delete links so you can remove images later. * View statistics about any image on imgur including number of views, size, and date uploaded. * View imgur images others have linked you to. Disclaimer: The Imgur logo and “IMGUR” are trademarks of Imgur LLC and are used here for informational purposes only. Imgur Android is not affiliated with Imgur and has not been reviewed or approved by Imgur.
release_text: * Better Material design support in dialog boxes * Fix force close when sharing from certain camera apps * New Permission: READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE Many users have experienced a permission error (resulting in a force close) when trying to share pictures from their camera app. This is because the camera app asked to upload an image without granting permission to read it. This permission is a work-around so that I can still upload the requested image.

description: Enhanced version of Network Places Lite. If you have the demand for Android connecting to a computer, for example, viewing photos or watching movies, you will find that it is suitable for this App! SMB (Samba/CIFS) client for Android devices. It allows connecting to shared folders hosted on Windows or Samba servers over Wifi. It allows managing several connections with authentication. It comes with both a device file browser and a SMB file browser. It provides download support for files and folders. You can rename, delete, and view media files. Browse and transfer intents are available for third party applications. Root access is not needed. The advanced video player is also embedded to help to play video in your phone and it is totally free！ The video player supports all the most popular video formats without any conversion. Its smart core technology auto detects video formats, subtitles and makes it much easier for you to enjoy smoother, better quality videos. But it might block some features if AD can't successfully load. Some Custom ROM will redirect ad links, please check your / etc / hosts file to prevent blocking ads. Features: Connect to Windows share folder. Upload and download files through samba protocol. Shortcuts and Bookmarks management. Enhanced Image Viewer. Online media playing via Samba Online document reading via Samba Full features Media player(Innocomm Player Plugin) free to download. Remote Desktop(RDP) Advantages Online media playing via Samba Online document reading via Samba Full features Media player(Innocomm Player Plugin) free to download. Enhanced Image viewer. MX Player Compatible TV Mode We're looking for translators in many more languages. The implementation is in progress,any suggestion is welcome! http://www.facebook.com/NetworkPlacesLiteInnocomm http://www.mobile01.com/topicdetail.php?f=423&t=3504302&p=1#45603161 How to Add a Shared Folder in Windows 7 http://www.wikihow.com/Add-a-Shared-Folder-in-Windows-7 Author: Mori Lin. Sann-tîng-poo

description: Offline topographic map provided by http://alpenkarte.eu of the Dolomite mountain range, as defined by the European Alpine Club (AVE: http://goo.gl/JXGBIe ). Suitable for planning summer outdoor activites such as hiking, rock climbing or mountain biking. The comprehensive map of this region can be viewed under the following link: http://alpenkarte.eu/smartphone_hiking_map/Dolomiten ? Since this is an extremely large region it is necessry to have a memory capacity of at least 200MB available on your device. Please activate your WLAN connection before proceeding to download this map. The installer allows you to download and install the map onto your Android Smartphone or Tablet, so that an Internet connection is no longer necessary for its usage. The usage of the map is supported by any one of the following Apps: - Alpenkarte.eu ( http://goo.gl/xyjCro ) - Locus Map Free or Pro ( http://goo.gl/nqzLZP )

Air Horn is one of the most popular android widgets. The air horn sound effect draws a lot of attention because it is so loud! It will surprise your friends. It's one of the simplest fun apps to use. How about using it for your April fools pranks? That's going to be a lot of fun! Believe it or not the air horn prank has the power to make you more popular among your friends Air Horn displays an image of an air horn in the center of the screen. Touching the image will cause your Android device to blare a loud air horn sound. It will vibrate as long as the button is pressed up to approximately 11 seconds. The air horn sound effect will help to have more fun at parties. Use the hornblaster at sporting events. Even use it at camp hooked up to speakers to make it an incredibly loud alert tool. This coolest app is 100% FREE. It's one of the most popular android apps. Go ahead download Air Horn NOW. KNOWN ISSUES: None at this time. FEATURES: * Enable or Disable vibration while activating. About Required Permissions: INTERNET, ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE, READ_PHONE_STATE, WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE, These are used just for ads and writing the program to external storage. No personal information is collected. VIBRATE, This is used to vibrate the phone when the image is pressed.

description: The set of widgets and shortcuts as add-on to to free "Memoires: The Diary" application. Widgets make sense to be used as additions to free "Memoires: The Diary" application which should be already installed on device! "Memoires Widgets" is not a separate application and it's icon does not appear in the list of apps, but installation adds two widgets and three shortcuts into the Android widget/shortcut lists, which could be used for fast access to "Memoires: The Diary". To add widgets/shortcuts to the Home screen tap and hold a finger over free space on the Home screen, then choose Widgets/Shortcuts from popup menu, find and choose Memoires widget/shortcut. "Memoires: The Diary" is the journal/diary application and could be downloaded and installed separately at no charge and without advertising . https://market.android.com/details?id=net.nakvic.dromoris
