description: PaSTE is a Plain and Simple Text Editor for Android tablets. With PaSTE you can easily create, edit, and manage text documents. Format your text document with common options (bold, italics etc.) at the touch of a button, or with common keyboard shortcuts! PaSTE is built with hardware keyboards in mind so that you don't have to keep reaching for the screen when you don't actually need to. Create a new document with Ctrl+N, enter and exit Bold-mode with Ctrl+B, save your document with Ctrl+S and more! Sometimes you need to pick up and run, or you want to switch between many apps, but you first have to manually save what you're busy with. PaSTE takes care of that for you - your document is automatically saved without irritating prompts. PaSTE documents are saved as HTML files that are easily readable by office suits. You can share your documents with Dropbox, Google Docs etc. by long-pressing a document in the list and selecting "Share". (Note with Google Docs sharing: remember to select "Convert file to Google Docs document") Undo and Redo functionality is also available with shortcuts (Ctrl+Z and Ctrl+Y) along with a toggle-able word count. TL;DR * Create, edit & manage text documents (saved as html) * Formatting options * Keyboard shortcuts * Autosaving * Easy sharing with Dropbox, Google Docs etc. * Undo/Redo * Word count * FREE!
release_text: - Fixed a force close issue when going to the Settings screen from the edit screen. Thanks to the people who reported the issue.

description: Pebble Notification Settings lets you control which notifications you receive on your Pebble Smartwatch. All apps are supported (Yes, WhatsApp with contact name and message text, GMail, Calendar, Facebook, Hangouts etc.) - simply search for the app in the list and toggle it on or off. Please ensure that you have Pebble Notification Settings enabled in to have Notification access. Tap on the Settings button in the Action bar, select "Enable notification access" and ensure that it's switched on in the list. NOTE: This app is only for phones with Android 4.3 or above.

Bodybuilding Workout Log is a very easy to use workout tracker application. The goal of this app is to allow you to workout and log your training results without looking at the phone all the time, with as little screen taps as possible. Pure training log! Both beginners and experienced lifters (in bodybuilding, power lifting or fitness) will benefit from this workout journal's simplicity and features which include: ★ free choice of workout exercises. You do not need to deal with a long list of exercises that you never use in your training. Add exercises that you love and name them in a way that is clear to you; ★ import of popular exercises for a quick start (as well as a sample routine); ★ saved training routines with pre-defined exercise selection; ★ dynamic training routines, where one can select exercises on the go; ★ comments/notes for sets; ★ always visible history of sets, reps, weight, comments and rest times (no need to interrupt your training to view previous history); ★ detailed workout history with a calendar and stats; ★ progress tracking with graphs for 1 rep max; ★ deletion of incorrectly logged workout sets; ★ rest timer with vibration and an optional sound notification, which is extremely useful if you train with headphones; ★ smart automatic rest interval selection ; ★ option to show best results from each workout only; ★ option to show results from the same routine only; ★ log of 1RM changes; ★ export of all workout history to a CSV file on the SD card; CSV files can be opened and processed with most spreadsheet editors; ★ summary of achievements displayed after training (including new records, total weight moved , training time, intensity); ★ sharing of summary screens (Facebook, email, SMS or any other sharing provider that is installed on your phone); ★ resuming of incomplete workouts; ★ performing supersets using back/forward navigation and comments; ★ smart pre-entering of weight for the next set; ★ backup and restore of all exercises and training history, you can move all created exercises and all training history to another device at any time. Please visit our site http://www.bbworkoutlog.com for news about new workout tracker features and version releases. Or follow us on twitter https://twitter.com/bbworkoutlog to get the latest updates. This application uses free icons from http://icomoon.io/ (CC 3.0 license)

We include support for Zip files and RAR files for Extraction.This app also compresses files into zip folder. Zip UnRar Unzip provides easy to use UI for Zipping a file and Extracting a Zip file and Unrar support. Features: 1. Compress Files/Folders into Zip Files. 2. Extract Zip Files. 3. Extract Rar Files into individual files.

في هذه اللعبة المسلية نقدم لك أجمل وأهم معالم ومدن العالم استكشف المعالم السياحية حول العالم واختبر معلوماتك، تعلم استفد واستمتع بالتحدي... هل تعرف لأي مدينة هذه الصورة؟ هل تعرف ما أسم المعلم الذي يظهر في الصورة؟ - استمتع بالصور المميزة وعالية الجودة - تعرف على أهم وجهات السياح في العالم - تعرف على أهم المعالم في الدول العربية - اسئلة متنوعة وتدرج في الصعوبة بعد كل إجابة صحيحة نزودك بمعلومات شيقة ومفيدة عن المعلم أو المدينة. لعبة عالمية الآن باللغة العربية وبجودة عالية

زاجل هو تطبيق وأداة لجدولة الرسائل القصيرة sms. هل تريد ضبط الرسالة لتصل في ساعة معينة؟ هل تريد ان تكون اول من يرسل تهنئة لصديقه في عيد ميلاده؟ هل احتجت ان ترسل رسالة خلال نومك؟ هل تمنيت لو بامكانك تعديل الرسالة بعد ارسالها? كل ما عليك هو كتابة محتوى الرسالة وعنوان المرسل وضبط تاريخ وساعة الارسال. في الوقت المحدد يقوم البرنامج تلقائيا بارسال الرسالة حتى ولو كان الجهاز في وضعية النوم دون اي حاجة لتشغيل البرنامج. ميزات التطبيق: * يمكن اختيار عدة مستلمين للرسالة من سجل جوالك * مرونة الجدولة - تحديد الرسالة لتاريخ وساعة ولحظة معينة * الرسائل ترسل في الوقت المحدد حتى ولو كان الجهاز في وضعية النوم او التطبيق غير مشغل. * يمكنك تعديل الرسائل بعد تعيينها, كما يمكنك اعادت جدولتها استعمال التطبيق: لاضافة رسالة جديدة انقر ايقونة الرسالة في الجزء العلوي من الشاشة, قم بادخال محتوى الرسالة واسماء المرسل اليهم ثم قم بتعيين تاريخ وساعة الارسال. ثم قم بحفظ الرسالة. Zagel is an application and a tool to schedule SMS sms. Do you want to adjust the message to arrive at a certain hour? Do you want to be the first to send congratulations to his friend on his birthday holiday? Do you need to send a message during your sleep? Have you ever wished you can modify the message after sending? All you need is to write the content of the message and the sender's address and set the date and time of transmission. At the time the software will automatically send a message even though the device is in sleep mode without any need to run the program. Application features: * Can choose multiple recipients for a message from your mobile phone log * Flexible scheduling - the message to determine the date and hour and a certain moment * Messages sent in time even if the device is in sleep mode, or the application is not the operator. * You can modify messages after her appointment, as you can re-scheduled Use of the application: To add a new message, click the message icon at the top of the screen, enter the content of the message and the names of consignees and then set the date and time of transmission. And then save the message.

Test your problem solving skills, can you solve these fun logic quizzes ? Your goal is to place a fleet of battleships in the sea so that ships don't touch each other. The number of ships in each row and column is predetermined. Each puzzle has a unique solution that can be discovered without guessing ! - Nice and clean interface, following android design guidelines. The game contains: - 6x6 levels - 8x8 levels -10x10 levels. with ranging difficulties: Easy, Medium, Hard. ***** I like it very much because it is very simple logical and intuitive game, one of the best I coud find in the latest time ***** I love it, I recommend ***** Very good. It's easy for playing

Four-Leaf clover that brings "happiness" to you. Use this as your phone's standby mode, might raise your fortune and make your wish come true... If you touch or flick the screen, the place you touched will glow, so cuteee!! ■Method: To setup Live Wallpaper, long tap the blank space of HOME Screen (Desk Top), or from MENU, select [Setup Wallpaper] then select the Live Wallpaper you have already downloaded. (Setup method may vary depends on the type of your device) ■Important: ※Please use ver [Android 2.2] or over ※This Application works only on devices purchased in Japan. We are not guarantee Application will work on any device purchased outside Japan.

iBaloot for Android iBaloot is a turn-based single or multi-players card game popular in Arab world. Currently, the game supports three platforms, including Android. There is a logic and fun associated with the iBaloot.  In the game, 4 players divide into 2 teams, two players in each and the rest of the game is played based on Baloot’s rules which are almost common everywhere. iBaloot Application simulates the real cards game to be more user friendly and entertaining mobile version of the game. iBaloot provides a solutions for playing anytime and anywhere with anybody. In fact, ibaloot is becoming part of our society as you can see student, teachers, engineers, managers, doctors and almost everyone are enjoying playing baloot. iBaloot connects the new generation with the old, makes friends and creates a level of excitement and enjoyment about playing Baloot. iBaloot allows users to design his room, cards, avatar and his local accent. No matter where you are, now you can enjoy playing offline or online, ask your friends to play, send or receive gifts, collect points and ranks yourself in the top players’ list. To make it a way attractive and communicable, we’ve added a new voice command feature. Using this feature, users will be talk to their teammates with voice commands. We try to make this game as sociable as possible, where the players can add new friends and make their own friend list. To make the game more interactive and fun, we’ve added a new feature to enable players send and receive the gifts from other players during the game.

Now works with HTC One built in IR. Infrared Capture application for use with TouchSquid remote app. REQUIRES IR blaster accessory Global Cache iTach or Keene KIRA or IRTrans Lan I/O. Some Samsung tablet models have IR transmitters but none have IR receivers so cannot use this app without one of the above external devices. Don't buy this app unless you have one! Report bugs or get help from support@touchsquid.com
release_text: Now creates folder TSR/caps/user and saves files there. Added feature to allow a fixed IP address for external blaster. Enforced naming to allow captured files to be recognized by TS Remote app. Files now stored in TSR/caps folder. Now works with HTC One built in IR. Fixed a bug when changing bottom margin.

description: *** A-League Live now includes FFA Cup coverage! *** Australia’s number one A-League app is back for a massive 2014/15 season. With over 4 Million downloads, Sportsmate Mobile’s apps are the fastest way to get live scores, stats and news. "Best A-League App out there! Easy, simple yet full of what you need and fast”. "The app is great, fantastic, awesome. It tells me everything I need to know". Features Include: - News - Pitch map with animated goal and shot charts. - Detailed visual stats. - Push notifications. - Live text commentary. - Full pre-match coverage – including team selections, form streaks, latest odds, weather, and previews. - Table, including home and away tables plus teams’ next 5 games and recent form. - Season summaries. - View fixtures by the month. - Head-to-head analysis. - Player profiles – including career highlights and previous years’ stats. Please send all feedback to support@sportsmatemobile.com , or use the feedback form in Settings. We actively use Twitter to let you know about updates, new features and interesting stats, plus respond to any questions that you may have via @Sportsmate.
release_text: * 10″ tablets support! * Optimisations and bug fixes

description: * Corrects music stream (A2DP) volume when connected to Bluetooth device and restores it on disconnect. (option) * Captures car location automatically when device disconnects. Automatic car locator. (option) * Reads text messages (SMS & notifications) while device is connected. (option) * Automatically launch app, or shortcut when Bluetooth connects. (option) * Automatically connect to a Bluetooth device when first device connects. Can also automatically enable Bluetooth to do this. This fixes the problem some car stereos have where A2DP media streaming does not automatically connect. (option) Note: Will not initiate first device connection. * Automatically disable WIFI when device connects. (option) * Automatically remember last used media volume to restore when device connects. (option) * Silence notifications while connected. (option) * Also supports Audio Jack connections, Car Dock, Power Connection, and Home Dock as a virtual device. (option) * Each device can be independently configured. * Location for each device is also stored separately. * Contains widget for finding where you parked your car. Automatically adjusts the media volume on Bluetooth connect and resets on Bluetooth disconnect. Automatically captures location information on disconnect so you can find where you left your car. Location can also be triggered when exiting car mode. Includes location widget to find your car. Can configure to also respond to home dock and audio jack as well. Each device is individually configured. Fixes A2DP WIFI stutter with optional auto-WIFI disable on Bluetooth connect. Auto launch app, playlist, Pandora Radio station, or shortcut on connect. Auto connect another A2DP Bluetooth device after first device connects. Read out text messages when connected to a device in the list using audio stream and Text To Speech services (see manual for details). See details here: http://code.google.com/p/a2dpvolume/ Bluetooth devices must be paired to be seen by this app. Pair the devices using Android network settings before using this app for Bluetooth. Please read the manual before using: http://code.google.com/p/a2dpvolume/wiki/Manual . Please post any issues to the issues list on the website. I can only fix problems I know about and I need to know the details of the problems to fix them. This app is free, open source, and contains no ads. The "stored location" button will retrieve the location of the last Bluetooth device that disconnected while the service was running. Setting the preference "notify in foreground" and "start at boot" will ensure the service is running when needed. Do not install to SD card if you are using the "start at boot" feature. A2DP Volume does not initiate the connection to the first device. If you need an app that does get this: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=a2dp.connect The text message reader can be tricky to set up. Here is some help: http://code.google.com/p/a2dpvolume/wiki/Reading_SMS For those who don't use the new features, older versions of the app are available for download here: http://code.google.com/p/a2dpvolume/downloads/list All permissions are explained here: http://code.google.com/p/a2dpvolume/wiki/Permissions I have no interest in advertising or monetizing this app. Please don't contact me with offers to do so.
release_text: See update details here: http://code.google.com/p/a2dpvolume/wiki/Updates See issue details here: http://code.google.com/p/a2dpvolume/issues/list 2.11.2 and up require Android 4.04 or higher. Now supports reading notifications for any apps you choose via Android accessibility service. . See instructions here: http://code.google.com/p/a2dpvolume/wiki/Accessibility_Settings

description: Today In History. Discover what happened today in history by English. Learn English by listening history. Learn history and improve your English learning, reading and listening comprehension skills. Ever wanted to know what happened on this day in history? Users can learn about interesting events daily. #mp3 are free to download #audio and subtitle together

AfriForum GPS, a complete GPS on your smartphone, keeping you on track, with the voice of Steve Hofmeyr, all in Afrikaans! AfriForum GPS offers you: • A complete mobile GPS with voice guided navigation system • Integrated Logbook functionality – logs trips & toll fees • NATIONAL data coverage • 3D Navigation views, voice commands & a bird's eye view with satellite imagery • Send to Friend Menu Option, share locations with the handy Inbox feature – never type an address again, simply Inbox it! • Find addresses and points of interest instantly, using free text search • Trip summary • Route history • Dynamically updates routes for travelling saleswomen and men, and delivery drivers The AfriForum GPS Application is built on the specific operating system of your phone, leveraging the unique features of your handset. The Application makes use of the AfriGIS Navigation Server via the mobile internet, integrated with a high quality AfriGIS map set. Note: Continued use of GPS running in the background can decrease battery life.

Данная программа представляет собой электронный справочник пестицидов. Для удобства работы с программой она разделена на три раздела: справочник по гербицидам справочник по пестицидам справочник по фунгицидам Это делает программу незаменимым помощником агронома при выборе препаратов для защиты растений. При выборе любого из препаратов Вы можете получить такую информацию, как: препаративная форма; действующее вещество; обрабатываемая культура; норма расхода; объект, против которого ведется борьба. Также программа поможет в выборе пестицидов для соблюдения ядооборота и подбора аналогов препаратов. В программе предоставлены фото упаковок оригинальных препаратов, что дает возможность избежать приобретения контрафактной и фальсифицированной продукции. Интуитивно понятный, приятный и детально продуманный интерфейс делает работу с программой удобной и простой. This program is an online directory of pesticides. For the convenience of the program is divided into three sections:     Guide to herbicides     Pesticide Manual     Reference fungicides This makes it indispensable agronomist when selecting plant protection products.    If you choose any of the drugs you can get information such as:     formulation;     active ingredient;     the crop;     the rate of application;     object against which there is a struggle.    The program also helps in selecting pesticides for compliance yadooborota and selection of unique products.    The program provided photo packs of original drugs, so as to avoid purchasing counterfeit products.    Intuitive, enjoyable and thoroughly thought-out interface makes using the program easy and simple.

A handy and beautiful app to access real time data provided by the government for traffic, weather and transit planning. In one click you can enter your current destination and where you want to go, the app will connect to real data and provide you with the information you need to get where your going anywhere in the Big Apple! Have fun and tell your friends please =D
Huruf dan Angka adakag dasar kemampuan bahasa maupun matematika. Ajarkan sejak anak usia dini (2-3 tahun). Dengan mendownload aplikasi ini, anak bisa belajar dengan mudah dan mandiri.

Jeux éducatifs (4) pour les enfants de 4 à 10 ans. Voix et textes en FRANCAIS. [Jeu complet / Garantie sans virus et sans aucune publicité / vous pouvez tester ce jeu dans sa version gratuite] Ces 3 jeux, destinés aux enfants à partir de 3 ans, ont la particularité de rendre l'enfant complètement autonome dans son apprentissage, même s'il ne sait pas lire, car il est uniquement réalisé à partir de symboles simples, et les instructions sont lues clairement (nécessité d’avoir du son). Ce jeu éducatif est entièrement en français (textes et voix). Il y a trois modes de jeux éducatifs : - un jeu de calcul : d'une manière très ludique et interactive, l'enfant va chercher combien il y a de fruits. Il va s'amuser à déplacer les fruits avec son doigt, pour voir s'il n'y aurait pas de fruits cachés. Il devra ensuite les compter et valider sa réponse. - un jeu de différences : une quinzaine de jeux de différences vont permettre à l'enfant d'aiguiser son sens de l'observation. Il va devoir trouver les différences entre deux dessins, a priori similaires. A chaque élément trouvé, un petit décompte lui permet de savoir combien il lui en reste à trouver. - un jeu de reproduction : les fruits teintent dans un ordre précis, et l'enfant devra ensuite reproduire l'ordre de ces fruits. C'est sa concentration et sa mémoire immédiate qui seront énormément stimulés d'une manière très amusante. Une musique très douce accompagne l’enfant dans son exercice, et à chaque fois qu’il répond juste, il est encouragé dans ses efforts par des applaudissements, un rire, et des "bravo". L’interface a été spécialement conçue pour les enfants. Le style graphique est doux et coloré. Les éléments de l'interface se détachent de l’écran de manière vive pour être bien identifiés par l'enfant. Ce jeu permettra à votre enfant d’apprendre, tout en s’amusant, à aiguiser son sens de l'observation, et à s'initier au calcul... et surtout, il passera un très agréable moment. L'enfant est complètement autonome devant ce jeu, car toutes les consignes sont (en français) très clairement. La musique est très douce, et va accompagner l'enfant avec calme dans son jeu. Chaque mini-jeu évolue progressivement. /* Si vous constatez un "bug", n'hésitez surtout pas à m'envoyer un mail : réponse assurée */ /* les mots d'encouragements sont aussi très très appréciés */ Pour l’anecdote, tous mes jeux éducatifs sont "validés" par ma fille de 3 ans et demi (très important, le "demi"). Et croyez-moi, ma fille est très "directe" (pour ne pas dire "sans pitié")... et je ne mets sur le Store que les jeux qui ont passé sa "validation"... Ce quatrième jeu est beaucoup plus complet que les 3 autres, et beaucoup plus riches. Les interactions sont plus nombreuses. Educational games (4) for children 4 to 10 years. Voices and texts in FRENCH. [Complete set / warranty free of virus and no advertising / you can test the game in its free version] These three games, for children from 3 years, have the distinction of making the child completely autonomous in their learning, even if he can not read because it is only made from simple symbols and instructions are read clearly (need sound). This educational game is entirely in French (text and voice). There are three modes of educational games: - A set of calculation: a very fun and interactive way, the child will look how many fruits. It'll be fun to move the fruit with his finger to see if there would be no hidden fruit. It will then count and validate its response. - A set of differences fifteen games differences will allow the child to sharpen his sense of observation. He will have to find the differences between two pictures, similar in principle. Each element found a small settlement lets him know how much it remains to find. - A set of reproduction: fruits tinged in a specific order, and the child will then reproduce the sequence of these fruits. This is its concentration and short term memory that will greatly stimulated a very amusing. A very soft music accompanies the child in the exercise, and every time he just answers, it is encouraged in its efforts with applause, laughter, and "congratulations". The interface has been specifically designed for children. The graphic style is soft and colorful. The interface elements are detached from the screen so bright to be clearly identified by the child. This game will help your child to learn while having fun, sharpening his sense of observation, and to initiate the calculation ... and most importantly, he spent a very pleasant time. The child is completely self before the game, because all the instructions are (in French) very clearly. The music is very soft, and will accompany the child calmly in his game Each mini-game is gradually changing. / * If you see a "bug", do not hesitate to send me an email: * guaranteed response / / * The words of encouragement are also very much appreciated * / For the record, all my educational games are "validated" by my 3 year old daughter and a half (very important, the "half"). And believe me, my daughter is very "direct" (not to say "no mercy") ... and I put on the Store that games that have passed its "validation" ... The fourth game is much more complete than the other 3, and much richer. Interactions are more numerous.

Jeux éducatifs (3) pour les enfants de 2 à 8 ans. Voix et textes en FRANCAIS. VERSION GRATUITE [Garantie sans virus et sans aucune publicité] Ces 3 jeux, destinés aux enfants à partir de 2 ans, a la particularité de rendre l'enfant complètement autonome dans son apprentissage, même s'il ne sait pas lire, car il est uniquement réalisé à partir de symboles simples, et les instructions sont lues clairement (nécessité d’avoir du son). Ce jeu éducatif est entièrement en français (textes et voix). Il y a trois modes de jeux : - un jeu de calcul, lors duquel l'enfant devra compter le nombre de fruits présents sur un arbre magique. La difficulté évolue progressivement, et petit à petit, il y a davantage de fruits, et plusieurs familles de fruits. L'enfant devra calculer et retenir mentalement le nombre de fruits dans chaque famille (prunes, pommes, poires...) - un jeu de puzzle, qui va amener l'enfant à observer avec attention l'image qui lui est proposée. Encore une fois, la difficulté évolue très progressivement ; le jeu commence avec deux propositions simples, puis évolue avec un nombre de choix plus important, et des images plus complexes. - et, pour finir, un jeu facile d'observation, qui va permettre à l'enfant d'être valorisé et amusé dans son exercice. Un petit lapin blanc se cache dans toutes sortes de contenants (chapeau de magicien, chapeau de sorcière, seau, caisse... Il devra indiquer où le lapin blanc s'est cachée. Ce petit exercice est davantage une récréation, un moment de détente, qu'une épreuve mentale. Le petit lapin, malicieux, ré-apparaîtra si l'enfant ne sait plus où il s'est caché. Une musique très douce accompagne l’enfant dans son exercice, et à chaque fois qu’il répond juste, il est encouragé dans ses efforts par des applaudissements et des "bravo". L’interface a été spécialement conçue pour les enfants. Le style graphique est doux et coloré. Les éléments de l'interface se détachent de l’écran de manière beaucoup plus vive pour être bien identifiés par l'enfant. Ce jeu permettra à votre enfant d’apprendre, tout en s’amusant, à aiguiser son sens de l'observation, et à s'initier au calcul... et surtout, il passera un très agréable moment. Chaque mini-jeu évolue progressivement. /* Si vous constatez un "bug", n'hésitez surtout pas à m'envoyer un mail : réponse assurée */ /* les mots d'encouragements sont aussi très très appréciés */ Pour l’anecdote, ce jeu a été réalisé pour ma fille de 3 ans et demi (très important, le "demi"). Et croyez-moi, ma fille est très "directe" (pour ne pas dire "sans pitié")... et je ne mets sur le Store que les jeux qui ont passé sa "validation"... Devant son succès, je l’ai mis sur le « Play Store ». Je suis sûr qu’il rendra vos enfants tout aussi heureux d’y jouer… Educational games (3) for children 2 to 8 years. Voices and texts in FRENCH. FREE VERSION [Guarantee virus free and no advertising] These 3 games, for children from 2 years, has the distinction of making the child completely autonomous in their learning, even if they can not read, because it is only made from simple symbols and instructions are read clearly (need sound). This educational game is entirely in French (text and voice). There are three game modes: - A set of calculation, in which the child will count the number of fruits present on a magical tree. The difficulty is gradually and slowly, there is more fruit, and several families of fruit. The child must calculate and withhold mentally the number of fruit in each family (plums, apples, pears ...) - A puzzle game that will bring children to observe carefully the image which is proposed. Again, the difficulty is changing very gradually, the game begins with two simple propositions, then a number of changes with greater choice and more complex images. - And, finally, an easy game viewing, which will allow the child to be valued and enjoyed in its exercise. A small white rabbit hiding in all kinds of containers (wizard hat, witch hat, bucket, box ... It should indicate where the white rabbit is hidden. This little exercise is more of a recreation, a relaxing , a mental test. The rabbit, malicious, re-appear if the child does not know where he was hiding. A very soft music accompanying the child in its exercise, and every time he just answers, he was encouraged in his efforts by applause and "bravo". The interface has been specially designed for children. The graphic style is soft and colorful. The interface elements are detached from the screen so much more vivid to be clearly identified by the child. This game will help your child to learn while having fun, sharpening his sense of observation, and to initiate the calculation ... and most importantly, he spent a very pleasant time. Each mini-game progresses gradually. / * If you find a "bug", please do not hesitate to send me an email: guaranteed response * / / * Words of encouragement are also very much appreciated * / For the record, this game was made for my daughter 3 years (very important, "half"). And believe me, my daughter is very "direct" (not to say "no mercy") ... and I do on the Store that games that have passed its "validation" ... To its success, I put on the "Play Store." I'm sure your children will be just as happy to play ...

Luis.Babyphone is now available on iOS, Android, PC and Mac! Please try first the Demo Version! Features: - Microphone, Alarm or Vibration as feedback - Camera (with motion detection) - phone call - Skype call - Flashlight - Microphone sensitivity can be adjusted on the receiver - Events such as starting and stopping the app, connection info, resting phase and duration of the noise phase is stored and can be displayed as a list - Receiver will automatically give alarm (voice), if the Bateriestatus the transmitter falls below 10% - Receiver will automatically give alarm (voice) when connection is broken - The color of the Baby Monitor (transmitter / receiver) can be customized There are no additional costs in the normal mode, since communication happens within the local network, a spy is through encrypted transmission within their WLANs virtually impossible. You found issues or have feature requests? Send me an e-mail to info@petervolke.de This Baby Monitor is available for the following languages: German English French Italian Japanese Korean Dutch Norwegian Polish Russian Swedish Spanish Czech Turkish Hungarian Luis.Babyphone is now on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pages/LuisBabyphone/1409278289354363

description: With our unique game your child will solve the elementary math problems with great pleasure! The bright math coloring will allow your child not only to show the creative abilities but also to improve the knowledge of math. FEATURES: ★ NO ADS! ★ 2 game modes: Numbers and Problems ★ 2 languages: English, Russian ★ For kids different ages ★ Learning numbers ★ Addition and Subtraction problems ★ Kids-friendly interface ★ Different picture categories “Kids Coloring and Math” is helpful both for kids who learn numbers and for kids who train addition and subtraction. The game features two game modes: “PAINTING BY NUMBERS” and “COUNTING AND PAINTING”. In the first mode, children can study figures by painting numbered parts of a picture. In the second mode, kids should paint the picture by solving the problems. This helps to improve elementary arithmetical skills: addition and subtraction. There are MANY CUTE PICTURES to choose for coloring. The same pictures can be painted several times; numbers and problems in each case will be different! Free version contains 4 images available in two game modes! In the full version there is a set of 24 images for $1.99: fish, birds, animals, flowers, toys, cats etc. The new set of 12 cute Christmas coloring pictures is available for $0.99. All the pictures are available in 2 game modes! NEW VERSION COMING SOON: Additional packages with pictures and a new game mode “MULTIPLICATION AND PAINTING” will be available in the future versions. The training game “Kids Coloring and Math” is an entertaining kid’s app that will help your child to fall in love with mathematics!
release_text: Version 3.2.0: — bugs fixed — app optimisation Version 2.0.0: — 12 new pictures added — game over animation added — some minor bugs fixed Version 2.2.0: — music and sounds added — german language added — animations added Version 2.3.0: — small bugs fixed — general optimization

description: Triple Noir - is a fascinating addictive puzzle game in the setting of Chicago 1930, Prohibition, lawlessness of mafia and police opposition! //////Warning!////// By playing this game, you might: - Miss your bus-stop, - forget to do your homework, - forget to eat your dinner, - forget why you came to the toilet. It is your choice, how the game will evolve. Help mafia to seize this city and defeat the police or be the first defender of the city! Only you decide how to play! Collect masterly combination of figures and earn more score points and money. Think through every step, because the only thoughtless step can ruin all your plans! Compete with other players around the world. Share your scores on the leaderboard, and become the first! It is a dark times for Chicago at 1930. Prohibition promised to make life the inhabitants safer, but in fact Mafia raged more than ever. It's depends on you, is this city will sink into debauchery, alcohol and gambling, or police will be able to bring the order to this town, by an iron hand! Game Features: - Colorful animated characters - Unique atmosphere of colorful Noir - Cute user-friendly interface - Addicting game mechanics - Soundtracks was recorded by live musicians exclusively for this game! If you like puzzles, gangsters, police brutality, triple, joker, prison and depraved beauties, this game will not leave you indifferent!
release_text: Added low resolution textures for mobile phones with height 800px and lower. Fixed problems with different screen resolutions. Fixed logic of daily reward accrual. Updated version of game engine . Optimized loading of resources.

description: WordLink is a free, fun, and easy to pick up word search game with infinite words to find! The board is always changing, so be strategic. See how many word links you can find in 3 minutes, then do it all over again to beat your highscore! Perfect for quick games when relaxing or on the move. The fluid one touch gameplay is ideal for all mobile devices. The clear and crisp HD graphics will look great on your Android phone and tablet. - Drag your finger over the letters in all directions to form words - Once a word had been found, new letters fall down to jumble up the board! - 2 letter words are allowed - Diagonals can also be used - Infinite dictionary words are randomly created. - Saves your highscore, so you can try to beat it - Lists the words you've found in each game - Play with one hand on the train! - helps with your spelling! If you enjoy the app, please leave a nice review on the Google Play Store! Enjoy!
release_text: - Added a home button - Many new dictionary words added. - Fixed bug that stopped your phone from sleeping! - Now pauses the clock when the home button is pressed. - Reverted back to original app icon

description: This app downloads and stores 196 MB data on the SD card. Download has to be done over WIFI. You can try the free app "Ukulele Learning Lite" first, to check out if you like it. This app only contains english language. ”Learning Ukulele – In 7 Days ” is the ideal start to learn to play ukulele. You don´t need any knowledge to use this app. You just have to have a ukulele. You can use it as a learning tool, you can use the chordfinder to lookup some chords or the tuner to tune your instrument. The app contains 7 lessons, so it gives the beginner the opportunity to learn to play step by step. At the end of each lesson you will learn to play a song. If you have already started to learn to play the ukulele, you can skip a lesson or you can just go straight forward to the playalongs. "Learning Ukulele – In 7 Days" contains 7 exclusively made playalongs. Put on your earphones and start to jam. At the end of a week you will be able to play 6 popular songs on the uke.

Find dozens of colorful layouts in Mosaic Gems: Jigsaw Puzzle. Fill in the inlay with shining jewels of various shapes and try to outstrip your rival in multiplayer mode. This puzzle game is free to download, yet more fabulous patterns are waiting for you in full version. Features: -Unlock full version -100+ fun jigsaw levels -Family-friendly puzzle game -Multiplayer mode -Multilingual interface Mosaiс Gems is a free puzzle game for true jigsaw addicts. Complete numerous layouts with puzzle pieces of different forms. Tap the jewels to rotate them and use Trash Box to get rid of useless gems. Enable your network connection to activate muliplayer mode and compete online with other tiling puzzle fans! This free jigsaw is also a nice educational game for kids because its family-friendly gameplay is a fun way to develop their logic skills and reaction.

description: Feed an insatiable red cat in Steal the Meal: Free Unblock Puzzle. Enjoy a new comic twist on classic snakes mechanics with cute characters and amuzing sounds. Help the spy mice filch strings of sausages, fish, ham and other yummy treats from the fridge. The less moves you make, the more stars you get. Collect stars to unlock new brain-teasing levels for free! Challenge your logic with a cheerful unblock game for all ages! Product Features: * Cute character animation and sounding * 100+ challenging sliding block puzzles * Unlock new level packs free * Mind-twisting snakes game Once upon a time in a fridge. A fat red cat (no, not Garfield) always wants to eat. The only way for the mice to survive is to supply him with meat. Help them swipe some treats out the fridge in Steal the Meal: Unblock Puzzle. Move the mice with the strings of vegetables and fruit on the playfield to lead for the breadwinner to the door. Various obstacles will stand in your way. Some of them are movable, others have to be passed round. Apply your unblock skills to make the least moves and earn 3 stars. Sneak your way through 100+ puzzle levels and unlock new level packs free! Enjoy funny animated characters and original snakes game concept with a comic brain-teaser!

description: LOW PRICE FOR A LIMITED TIME! The Chicken and the Egg by Allan Plenderleith is a beautiful and touching story about a little chicken called Flo who dreams of one day laying an egg. One rainy night changes everything, but will Flo's dream ever come true? A charming fable with gentle comedy and a warm message which will be enjoyed by children and adults of all ages. Featuring 42 fully interactive, beautifully illustrated pages. Touching musical score by musician Nick Rice (from band Hadouken!) Charming narration by Mia Mitchell Over 50 animated interactions! From the author of best-selling books THE SMELLY SPROUT, THE BOY GIANT, and PRINCESS CHOCOLATE. www.allanplenderleith.com

"A charming adventure game with uniquely addicting gameplay" - SuperGameDroid "A maze-like underwater game" - apps zoom Underwater Adventures – Try The Most Challenging Adventure Ever! Are you an adventurer and a strategic thinker? Now it’s time for you to find out by playing the brand new Underwater Adventures game. Enjoy an underwater world filled with strange creatures, mystery, excitement, and fun, with a game that puts your navigational skills to the test. Be prepared to dive to the bottom of the ocean to find treasures in various locations. Be careful, though, because there’s a catch: you’ll have to face many underwater creatures and be always conscious of every move you make. Search for the hidden treasure while avoiding sharks, crabs, jellyfish, and even strange electrical shock creatures, while using whirlpools to take you to new, undiscovered locations. One wrong turn and you’ll be at the bottom of the ocean! ***** What Makes Underwater Adventures a Unique Game? ***** CHALLENGING UNDERWATER OPPONENTS. Underwater Adventures keeps you guessing all the time, so you never know when a shark, a crab or a strange shock creature will approach and attack you. Be careful! ATMOSPHERE AND SENSE OF DANGER. The atmosphere is one of mystery and danger due to the low visibility in the dark waters. Add in spooky music and high quality visuals and you’ll feel like you’re literally fighting for your very survival at the bottom of the ocean. CONTINUOUS CHALLENGE. The first few levels are easy to play to get situated with the game, but get ready for new challenges as you unlock new levels and get acquainted with new creatures. Soon, you’ll be addicted to this exciting game! PERFECT FOR KIDS AND ADULTS. Strategic thinkers can come from any age group, and Underwater Adventures is a perfect fit for all! Don't forget to rate and enjoy! **** We’re always up for listening to your questions and feedback -- please email us at support@applits.com or visit our app’s website and we will get back to you as quickly as possible. ****

It’s a girly game, but all those who like ponies and animal caring can enjoy it for sure. Features: - four ponies to play with - a spa salon where the user can bathe and wash the cute animals - 9 hairstyles and 9 tail hairdos for the characters - the users can dye each hair strand and fur with more colors at once - hoof salon for the pony’s pedicure - fashion stage with lots of special outfits and accessories - photo session where you can take pictures of your designed pony - high-quality graphics *************************************************** Let us know what you think! We value our users' opinion and strive to always offer the best experience we can. So please feel free to contact us at any time at support.googleplay@arpamedia.ro for any suggestions you may have, questions, bugs, ideas or for anything you'd like to share with us. Important for Parents: This App is free to install and play, none of its features are conditioned. It will be installed with basic elements for each of the salons, so that the users can enjoy the game’s experience. For more options and diversity, additional in-game items such as hairstyles, tails, nail polish colors and accessories in the Hair, Hoof and Pony Fashion salons, may be purchased for real money. For obtaining the full game, with No Ads and with the complete package of additional in-game items and extra characters, go to the game’s Shop and select Unlock All and Remove Ads. If you want to restrict this option, you can disable in-app purchases on your device. Privacy Policy: http://arpamedia.ro/privacy-policy.html

description: This comprehensive human skeletal system resource is an easy, interactive way to reference bone names and markings. Includes high quality skeletal photographs representing both the axial and appendicular skeleton. OpenLab.bones was created by educators at NC State University through BioCentric Media LLC, an NC State sponsored start-up. This app is a must have for human anatomy students, teachers, healthcare professionals, or anyone interested in learning more about the human body. *Introductory price for a limited time: $7.99 Top Features: • High quality, accurate information that visually emphasizes bone borders, regional bone markings, joints and associated cartilages • Easy to use, intuitive interface allows you to interact with both images and text • Variety of viewing options including the ability to easily rotate, cut, and change views • Multiple navigation options including menu, full skeleton, regional, and film strip selection

description: Author Jennifer Ensley and best-selling artist Phatpuppy present "Cursed by Diamonds"! What if a pure and loving heart unintentionally caused Angels to fall, demons to rise, and blurred the line between heaven and hell? Jenevier owns such a heart. An innocent, unadulterated purity that is too quick to find good where none exists. Her blind trust and radiant soul could be the answer long sought, or, it could mark the end of us all. FEATURES -Story narrated by the author, Jennifer Ensley -Beautiful stages by acclaimed artist Phatpuppy! -3 game modes: CASUAL, NORMAL, and CHALLENGE -4 ways to find items: PICTURE, SILHOUETTE, WORDS and RANDOM -2 difficulty settings: NORMAL and HARD -Training mode and hints are included Have fun!

Drug Interactions is a powerful international application to list and document interactions for all drugs. It also includes Prescription Checker, our application to detect more than 200 million potential drug interactions between two pharmaceutical forms. Drug interactions are detailed and drugs can be searched for from generic or brand names. Substitution by a similar drug or search for a drug are facilitated by browsing our comprehensive pharmacological classification. Patient management to store prescription history was added from version 1.2.7.

About: Crystal Story II is a turn-based RPG that follows the story of a young Dragon on his quest to defeat an evil witch. He must seek allies to aid him on his journey and save the world from the oncoming invasion. With the release of Crystal Story II on steam comes the Sword of the Fallen Dragon update. It adds new features and changes to the game. The android version will also get the update for free. Check out: http://store.steampowered.com/app/344860 Sword of the Fallen Dragon update: - New chapter (Chapter 6): A new threat has risen. Join the party once again as they investigate the strange mysteries that are happening on the Northern Orc Village. - New Side Quests: A pesky thief has been stealing items from the neighboring towns. The party is hired to catch the thief and return the items that were stolen. - Card Battle: Collect cards and challenge foes to a Card Duel in an all new minigame. - Battle Arena: Monsters line up to challenge your party in battle. Defeat them to earn prizes. - Pet Gifts: Your pet now goes on its own adventure while you are away and will occasionally give you its spare items. Features: - The main game features a turn based battle system where you control up to four heroes. Turn indicators let you see whose turn is going to be next. - Randomized dungeon layout lets you explore dungeons differently every time. - A story that spans a huge game world. Meet tons of NPCs and fight along side them. - Sidequests lets you explore and unlock optional dungeons around the game world. - Upgradable equipment lets you improve weapons and armor. Alchemy lets you combine items into new one. - Flexible level up system where you can mix and match classes to make your own unique class. - Fishing minigame lets you catch fish that can boost character performance. - Zombie defense minigame provides a challenging quest where you have to match three of a kind in order to defeat bosses and enemies. - Mercenary Defense minigame lets you hire mercenaries to defend against the oncoming horde. - Snowboard Extreme minigame lets you race downhill avoiding trees and yetis. Beat the time to win an item. - In game pet which you can dress up and summon during battle. - Optional quests and bosses appear once the game is over, so you can continue playing after beating the game.
release_text: Crystal Story II - "Giant Lotus" second form now shows its HP bar correctly. - Generic Quest and Proof of Might achievements should now properly unlock - Fixed "Mercenary Defense" Goblin getting stuck behind trees - Fixed dialogue typo (Bengal cutscene, Spiderking) - Added Hard Mode Bosses on the arena for fun - Boss music added to Arena bosses - Changed "Scribbled Card" description

description: Play now some of the most coolest girl games you can find on google play. In this fun game for girls you will meet a cute high school girl who needs you attention. A new swimming pool is opening in the local graveyard and the ghoul youth is really excited because they were sick and tired of the community pool. The grand opening takes place tonight and there will also be a concert and a lot of games for every ghoul..from monster football to eyeball pong. Stacy, the cutest girl at Girl High is really eager to go but she has to make a good impression regarding that she is not the most popular girl in the school. Her cute sisters are at the mall so it's up to you to help her find a perfect outfit for this occasion the will give her a confidence boost. Find something that is both casual yet stylish and appropriate for a day at the pool. She loves accessories and she thinks they are a must have addition to every ghoul girl outfit. After you figure out the perfect outfit give a new hairstyle that will make everyone notice her. With your help, today could be a great day for her at the pool!

developer: Jan Essig - Fun & Educational Games for kids
description: Do you or your children love logic puzzles? Are you looking for kids’ games that are easy to learn but challenge your brain; games that you can enjoy together with a youngster, that siblings can play together or your little ones can play safely on their own? Logic Playground includes 6 such games, all with a cute ocean theme and 9 different language options! As they enjoy Logic Playground children will be: • learning classic childhood games we all recognize • developing their problem solving skills • introduced to games that involve strategy and logic • working on visual scanning and discernment • developing matching and memory skills • reinforcing their knowledge of numbers from 1 to 10 • and most importantly, having fun! The 6 different games in the app are: • Tic Tac Toe or Noughts and Crosses. An ideal first game for young children as they learn the concepts of turn-taking and good sportsmanship. • 4 in a row. Simple but strategic. Like all the 2-player games in Logic Playground this one can either be played with a friend or played solo against the iDevice. • Shell game. Also known as Thimblerig - as the iDevice shuffles the shells, can you keep your eye on the one that contains the pearl? • Numbers. Three mini-games: matching numbers to dice faces, counting sea stars and practice writing numbers. • Mills or Nine Men’s Morris. Older kids (and adults) will love playing this game from the Roman Empire that’s easy to learn but challenging to win. • Color Code. A version of the board game Mastermind, this single-player code-breaking game uses fishes in bowls and has two levels of difficulty. This app was developed by me together with my children, incorporating feedback from parents and educators. It has been awarded 5/5 stars by kinderappgarten.de, iphonekinderapps and bestappsforkids.com who said: “Awesome app, awesome price! A number of our favorite childhood games packed into one app. Fantastic parental control features to boot!” And you don’t have to worry about your children playing independently with my apps. You can set a timer which will limit how long your child can play the games and because I take privacy and online safety very seriously my apps include: • no links to websites outside the app • no ads • no data collection or tracking • no social media sharing

Have an immense load of fun while playing Bricks Breaking II! In this game it is your job to destroy the grids by clicking groups that have at least three of the same colored blocks. Work fast though because time is not on your side. As you are breaking bricks more bricks are arriving on the screen! Fun tip: Do not fret though because if you are able to break at least 15 bricks you will be awarded a bomb and this will help destroy surrounding bricks. Time will fly while playing this fun filled game! ★ You will have an excellent time breaking the bricks that load on the screen ★ Auto scaled and optimized to the screen size of your device. ★ Great for phones and tablets. ★ Built using Adobe AIR for best performance. ★ No hidden fees. Play for free.

In the game of Bricks Breaking there is a grid of bricks of different colours. When you tap on a grid, the bricks that are all the same color will break, collapsing and causing the remaining bricks to merge. If you find during the game that there is a single brick that would help to be removed, use a magic wand and this will help to elongate your game. The game ends when you run out of magic wands and you can no longer destroy bricks by groups. This classic game of Bricks Breaking is an challenging yet awesome game to help pass time! ★ Bust the bricks by organizing them strategically in this fun game! ★ Includes your own personal leaderboard so you can play against your own rank. ★ Be sure to check out all of our other games by us. ★ Built using Adobe AIR. ★ If you have a suggestion or comment let us know! Published by Pulado Games, Inc. in partnership with Fupa.com.

In this game there will be a map filled with colored grids. Your colony starts with the home grid in the center of the map marked by a flag. The goal of the game is to turn all the grids into the same color. You can change the color of your home grid and all connected grids by clicking on other colored grids in the map. Continue the process and you will be able to turn all grids into the same color. The fewer the moves, the higher your score. ★ Practice your code breaking skills in this intense puzzler! ★ Auto scaled and optimized to the screen size of your device. ★ Great for phones and tablets. ★ Built using Adobe AIR for best performance. ★ No hidden fees. Play for free.

In this game, you need to play penalty shootout with the computer. First, choose your team and the computer's team, then the shootout begin. Use the mouse to point to the position you want to shoot to, when you shoot, there may be some deviations so don't go too far. When the computer shoots, you also use the mouse to decide where the goal keeper should jump to. After 5 rounds, if both teams have scored the same, then extra rounds will be added until one of the teams scored higher. ★ Play penalty shootout against the computer in this fun sport game! ★ Auto scaled and optimized to the screen size of your device. ★ Great for phones and tablets. ★ Built using Adobe AIR for best performance. ★ No hidden fees. Play for free.

description: SamSam's super adventure games: fun and educational activities for Kids in Preschool, Kindergarten and first grade from 4 to 8 years old. Fun educational adventure games for kids 5 to 8, featuring SamSam the cosmic hero. Ideal games to develop logic, observation, concentration, speed, and memory skills. Your child will learn to build a spaceship, fly like a super pilot and defeat the nasty space monsters! - The first 2 games are free to play. - All games evolve with the player's level. - 6 different player profiles can be saved. - Games become progressively more difficult and change each time you play. - Players win super hero medals as their score improves. Each game provides a unique super hero challenge! CHALLENGE #1: IMPROVE YOUR SPEED Tap the monsters as fast as you can, but don’t tap your friends! CHALLENGE #2 – LEARN TO FLY Touch and hold SamSam to make him fly. Avoid the obstacles… CHALLENGE #3 – BUILD YOUR FLYING SAUCER Build your flying saucer with the puzzle pieces. CHALLENGE #4 – BECOME A SUPER PILOT Choose the right shape to help SamSam continue his flight course. CHALLENGE #5 – EXERCISE YOUR OBSERVATION SKILLS Find the differences between the two pictures. CHALLENGE #6 – REPEL YOUR ENEMIES With your finger, drag the space pirates into the black hole. CHALLENGE #7 – IMPROVE YOUR REFLEXES Tilt the screen and collect the falling toys. Watch out for the garbage! CHALLENGE #8 – DEVELOP YOUR SUPER MEMORY Watch out for the character that has gone missing in this game of memory. CHALLENGE #9 –THE BIG GALACTIC COMBAT Eliminate all the monsters to become a real cosmic hero! ** SamSam is a character created by Serge Bloch for the children's magazines StoryBox and Little Red Apple (Pomme d’Api), published by Bayard. This application was created by Group Bayard, a leading French children’s publisher well known for its kids' applications: Polo's world, My first travel games with little Brown Bear, Learn English with Little Brown Bear, StoryBox, Mystery Street, ...

If you like solitaire for windows, then this is exactly what you are looking for, with all the functionality you expect when you play this classic patience game and much more. This version is optimized for iPhone and iPod play with cards that are easy to drag and drop, optional right hand grip so that you don’t need to cover the whole screen with your hand when you click for new cards. To make it more interesting you can choose to only play hands where you are sure that there are solutions as opposed to where the cards are dealt randomly and then they might lock each other. Compete with yourself in various ways either through conventional scoring or Vegas style, you can also choose to have the scores accumulate to see if you can beat the house. You can of course also try to beat your own best times and moves! Great, graphics and super smooth animations when you drag the cards as well as the classic animation when you win the game! And you of course also have the options of drawing 1 or 3 cards and decide to limit the numbers of times you can turn the deck.

Discover the spooky side of the ancient pyramids in this take of the popular solitaire game. Match the correct pairs of cards quickly to get massive score bonuses. Clear all the cards and unveil the glorious pyramids! FEATURES - addictive gameplay - graphics set in a spooky version of ancient Egypt - simple controls - leader board - atmospheric sound effects - the original accumulate scores mode. When the high score board in the game is full you can keep on trying to beat each other's scores! Simply put, this is a great version of pyramid solitaire which is even more fun at halloween.

Fun and educational game for kids with bright colorful pictures. This game should be good for kids from 2 years old. Game play is simple and intuitive. By moving the stickers on the playing field and finding it's place, kid grow his fine motor skills, creative thinking and memory. There are two variations of "sticking" process. The first one for older kids - placing stickers to correct place according to the sample image. The second, for younger ones, placing stickers with using additional help tips (press "?" button to activate that mode) Game include 18 colorful pictures in sticker book, 2 game modes and colorful animated little creatures which will rejoice the victories of the baby.

description: Designed and developed by noted travel expert Joel Widzer, Psy.D., this app will help manage your Jet Lag with this World Clock and Get information about jet lag causes, symptoms, prevention and treatment. Learn how to minimize the effects of travel across time zones with some helpful tips and strategies. This app offers a global map with features to monitor time differences between two cities along with the ability to calculate travel time between two destinations. The app also provides users with a chart detailing a typical sleep-wake-cycle for user’s “Home Time” and “Destination Time.” This is a calculated function of offsetting time zones correlated with the body’s internal timekeeper or circadian cycle. This helps users determine when they are most likely to feel sleepy and alert during their trips. The chart also details basic tips for countering the effects of travel fatigue. This handy app can help users manage travel fatigue, by understanding their “Home Time” and “Destination Time” zones.
release_text: Updates for Jet Lag Manager & World Clock version 1.6: New layout in Travel Time Calculator window; New Time Zones Database; New easier and better organized Home/Destination Time Zone Selection Interface; New design update connecting Home and Destination points within World Map; Correction of time zones with Australian territory; Improvements to performance and design; Correct loading freeze.

description: Please try out new puzzle game - Splitsum https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.jssapps.splitsum WORDGENUITY® JUMBLE QUOTES is a word jumble type game. Several letters are given and the goal is to reveal the famous quote or saying using the letters provided. To help you with each quote they are organized into groups. Each puzzle also provides the source of the quote (ex: who said it or what movie it's from, etc). Depending on your knowledge of the source you may be able to guess what some of the words are. For the rest of the words use the letters provided. Puzzles can be solved in any order. If you get stuck use a hint. Each hint will reveal the next letter in each of the unrevealed words. If you are still stuck use more hints. Hints are accumulated by solving puzzles without using a hint (free version). There are famous quotes from different groups such as television, movies and U.S. Presidents. The lite version contains 100 puzzles to solve. You are given 20 hints to get you started. Also, please check out our Google+ page at: https://plus.google.com/u/0/b/111188384974678543797/111188384974678543797/posts/p/pub Enjoy! KW: Anagram, Fun with words, Word Jumble, Word Scramble, Word Search.

Sit back and relax while your child has fun learning math. After your child hears the word they will get the chance to spell the word by dragging each letter to the correct column. The sound effects will help motivate your child and keep them wanting to learn more.

If there is only one card on the table and have the same sheet over you, then you can make 'Dry' and predate your opponents. Get advantage in the game amassing as many cards as possible. Diamonds Crush is a new highly enjoyable highscores puzzle game in which you must collect given number of diamonds to progress to the next level. How many diamonds can you collect? Submit your score to a global leaderboard to see who can collect the most diamonds! How to play: Put your finger on a diamond and move it to the neighboring diamond of the same color to create a chain! Longer chains give you better score! You have 45 seconds in each level, collect given number of diamonds to progress to the next level! Features: - global leaderboards included - you play against people all around the world - highly enjoyable game for all ages - great fun for the whole family - simple to play - 100% free full version of the game If you find any bug, please let us know at littlebigplay@gmail.com , we will be very happy to fix it! description: 03/2015: Added a new word search mode called RELAX! You don't have any limit in this new game mode but you can still submit your score (total games played). Each time you complete the RELAX mode the number of solved games is increased. And what more? You can play the RELAX mode even offline :). Enjoy! Welcome to Word Search Game - the largest collection of word search games on the market with 2 game modes. Our word search game contains over 800 categories of various genres and we are adding new categories every few days without a need to download the update! What more? Our Word Search Game is highscores based - you are challenging people all around the world, so don't forget to submit your score at the end of the game! You can submit a score of a single category all you overall game score! Go for highscores! And that's not everything, you can even change the game colors! Just press the buttons on the bottom of the screen - you can change the background color, color of the highlight line and color of the letters (your setting will be automatically saved) Our Word Search game contains categories such as Harry Potter, Angry Birds, One Direction, Lord Of The Rings, Movies, Minecraft, Simpons and hundreds of other categories from popular genres! How to play: Game is simple to play, but difficult to get to TOP20. Simply find all the words from the list as fast as possible! Your score depends on your speed! Can you make it to TOP20? Features: * 2 game modes - online and offline * 100% free full version + no In-App purchases * No registrations required - simply choose your nick and submit your score * Over 500 word search categories + new categories added every few days * Local and global leaderboards - you play against people all around the world * Online and Offline mode * Great fun for the whole family If you find any bug, please let us know at littlebigplay@gmail.com , we will be very happy to fix it! Hi girls. Welcome to another great baby bathing game. Our cute baby Lizzie loves to play a lot and now in these sunny days he spends a lot of time in the garden. In this caring baby games you have to give baby Lizzie a fun bath in the garden with bubbles and toys. So turn on the tap and bath him using sampoo and shawer gel and don't forget to keep the baby happy all time by giving him toys like rubber duck. Our baby is good and obedient but like other children his age has a lot of energy and wants to play all the time and needs your help because alone is not so funny. Play this new care baby game and have fun with baby Lizzie during all game. Start playing with him in the garden, then give him a bath with bubbles and then take him in the house and start dress up him with the most beautiful baby clothes. Do you like challenging but simple and addictive gameplay? Then Marbles Mania is perfect for you! One of the most popular games amongst fans in the marble shooter genre. This challenges casual and competitive gamers alike with diverse and progressively difficult levels. Your goal? Use your sharpshooter cannon to target and destroy all the multi-colored marbles by matching them before they reach the end of the path. Combining easy to learn gameplay with unique and entertaining backdrops and sound, Marbles Mania is an excellent challenge for players of all ages and skill levels. Need a bigger challenge? Additional levels and enhanced difficulty mode are available to players who want even more out of the game! Topple the high score of other Marble Maniacs! Full iPad and iPhone support is also available in the iTunes AppStore. Be an active part of this game: play, rate and leave feedback for improvements and features you would like to see. This game is actively supported, and your feedback and suggestions will help us improve your experience! It is similar to bubble shooter zuma-style games where your quest is to blast away the matching colored balls. Marbles are used instead of jewels in this game though we do have other flavours of this game if you look at our developer profile. We have a stellar version with different planets and stars, we have a doodling version with smiley faces, and even a holiday version with a grumpy elf. The objects tumble along a path but not quite at a blitz. They basically all roll to some blackhole in the end. It is not a puzzle, maze, or labyrinth, though some levels involve multiple paths or multiple chains of marbles. We also have a major update coming out in the new year which is a take away of this game involving 48 different levels over 8 different types of land to get to the dragon's lair at the end. You earn jewels in that one where you can purchase magic items in the store. Pixies appear giving you treasure which are the jewels. Amazing custom graphics and sound track. It is quite the saga. We hope this sparks interest in our matching games.

••• Simple experiments for kids to do at home ••• Discover a series of fun and easy science experiments for kids to do at home in your living room or kitchen. ••• Experiments for kids explained step by step in VIDEO ••• Experiments are illustrated and explained step by step. Your iPad will be turned into a real little scientific laboratory. The application makes science fun and easy! ••• Experiments you will be able to do: ••• •An egg that floats and sinks •Create multicoloured plants •Bend water with static electricity •Make an engine with a candle •Turn a tea bag into a rocket •Extract DNA from a pear •Make a mini jet boat from a chemical reaction •Float a piece of metal •Make a telephone with tin cans •Collect meteorites •Make a paper helicopter •Play music with 8 glasses •Make an extra powerful magnet •Observe the weight of air •Make a rainbow and more... ••• Quiz ••• Test your knowledge with the quiz. Sixty squares is a very addictive puzzle game that will make the boring time will pass very quickly. Your mission is to connect as many dots of the same color. Player can choose between two game modes: - Time mode (90 seconds), - Moves mode (45 moves). The game has a pure graphic design so that the player is focused exclusively on the game. The dots can be combined in the directions: up, down, left, right. If you manage to close the circuit to get triple points. In addition, the "movement" after the close of polling amount remaining in the game movement is not reduced. Try to get as many points and compare your score with other players. Ranking of the best results is available in the game. Try playing our game and you will see that you will not be able to stop!

Rule the game is to join all the dots on the screen. Connected points form the outlines of animals that appears on the screen along with its authentic sound. In this application you will find: - More than 100 high-quality images of animals, - Five beautiful animated scenes (forest, meadow, jungle, ocean, winter mountain) - Realistic sounds made by animals, - Tips in the form of arrows and dots vibrating, - Start to connect from any point, - Any line connecting points - Pets are grouped into: forest, winter, marinehomemade (rural) and exotic - Unique characters in each scene issuing funny sounds when touched, - Ability to go to the next animals at any time. The game is so simple that is ideal for younger children who will not want to stop playing it!

Remember Flappy Bird? Level of difficulty of the game drove you crazy? You want to play something easier and more fun? Try playing our game! As soon as you play it you will not be able to stop. You'll want to tap the new records! The controls are very simple - if you hold your finger on the screen - a bird flying up, if you do not touch the screen with your finger - a bird flying down. The aim of the game is to collect as many golden eggs. In addition, the game features online ranking, where you can compare your results with the results of your friends. Nice graphics in a retro style and a fun bird enrich your boring moments.

Memo Halloween for kids is a simple guessing game of two identical pictures. The game has a funny sound and a very nice graphics associated with Halloween (vampires, mummies, pumpkins, zombies, ghosts, spiders, etc.) - the children love it! The game has three difficulty levels: - Easy 3x4, - Medium 4x5, - Hard 5x6 Guess all the cards in the shortest possible time and subscribe to the online ranking. With Google game - you can compare your scores with the results of my friends.

app_name: Who is it? Slide and guess!
description: This game is very addictive quiz consists in guessing the name of famous people. The unique form of displaying photos and earn points immerse you in a long time, and a joy to use is incomparably greater than that of other applications of this type. The rules are simple! You have to guess who the people in the pictures as soon as possible and trying to see as the smallest area of ​​the image. The more you're wondering, or the more pictures you see (by sliding your finger across the screen), the less points you gain. Persons whose identity will be guessed this movie stars, celebrities, singers and other famous people. With each update, we will expand the base of famous people to the joy of playing was even greater. With Google Play Games Services you can compare your score to your friends or check on where you are in the global rankings. So what you are expert on famous people? All you have to only see the hair? Eyebrows? Eyes? Install our application and find out about it!

A free app giving you the latest information for many of the best birding locations in Europe and beyond, updating the classic ‘Finding Birds in..’ books by Dave Gosney. If you plan to visit any of these sites, take a look at what others have written already and, once you’ve been, feel free to write anything that you yourself would have found useful to know. What did you see? Has anything changed? What advice can you pass on? Whatever you write can be read and used by everyone who has this app. It's like having a 'birders log book' for every site in Dave’s books. New sites and sighting comments can also shared via the app on your Facebook page and also our 'Easy Birder' Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/pages/dave-gosney-easybirder/366888360582 You can find out more about my books, DVDs and other information on my website: http://www.easybirder.co.uk/

Creativity at your fingertips!   ★★★★½ "So far this is probably my favorite design app and it´s for free ! If you´re into geometric effects, this app is the one you need. " - Stephanie, Barcelona   HOW IT WORKS Start by importing a photo or taking one with your camera. Then select one of 40 geometric or prism shape filters. Then MARVEL at the beautiful, unique and original photo art you've created.   No other app makes it so simple and easy to be creative !   Proud of your geometric creation? Share your unique photo art creations with the world or submit them to the D3LTA gallery ( http://gallery.d3lta.me ). You can share with Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, WhatsApp and Pinterest directly from the app!   Whether you want to add a little bit of flair to your pictures or get serious about design or photography, D3LTA is the app for you.   D3LTA is for EVERYONE New to photography or design? Don't worry!   We're serious designers and artists based out of art capital BERLIN, but we love bringing creativity to the world. Make photo art. Share photo art! I tried apps like Fragment, Glitch and BlendPic, but none of them make it as easy and simple as D3LTA! Thanks guys!" - Becky, USA

description: Play part 2 of the FREE hidden object game Sherlock Holmes: The Valley of Fear. The story comes alive in this FREE illustrated hidden object puzzle game. The game takes you through the story with high-quality audio narration! Assist Holmes and Dr. Watson as they are summoned to a secluded English country house by a coded message. They arrive too late to save a life, but pursue the trail to unmasking the murderer through a series of perplexing clues. Based on the Oxford University Press edition of Sherlock Holmes: The Valley of Fear, this hidden object puzzle game features stunning art and stimulating puzzles designed by award winning game producer SecretBuilders. Each brain-teasing level unfolds a scene from the book with beautiful illustrations and audio excerpts. • Audio narration and book scene illustrations in each level! • Many gorgeous fairy tale scenes across lots of challenging hidden object games levels • Two puzzle modes of free game play: find by picture or by word • Magnifying glass feature to zoom in on those hard to find objects • A fun and enjoyable free game for kids to fall in love with reading and classics education • Among the best educational games for kids and adults to develop visual and spatial puzzle solving skills • Award-winning audio and illustrations from Oxford University Press

The year is 1849, and gold has just been discovered in California. You decide to head out west, to seek fame and wealth in the approaching Gold Rush. Will you strike it rich and become an overnight mining magnate? Or build your fortune bit by bit by supplying 49ers with pickaxes and blue jeans? Gameplay: 1849 is a city management game set during the California Gold Rush. Your task is to build towns, populate them with workers, and keep your citizens housed, fed, and entertained. You’ll have to manage and coordinate extensive production and trade networks to make sure your towns thrive. Key Features of 1849: - A campaign mode that traces the development of the Gold Rush from mining camps to bustling cities. Each city scenario presents players with unique starting conditions, victory goals, and obstacle events. - Sandbox mode with a procedurally-generated map for your location, based on geography (from the Pacific coast to the Sierra Nevada mountains), precipitation, resource availability, and starting lot size. - Vivid Old West towns with geography and architecture directly inspired by California’s Gold Country. - Over 50 resources to dig up, farm, refine or manufacture as you build complex towns and cities. - Classic city management gameplay meets modern technology in a sim tailored specifically for tablet / touch screen play. - Developed by SomaSim, a new studio dedicated to producing deep simulation games for today’s players.
release_text: Free bonus content: 2 Epilogue scenarios. The Epilogue presents two final scenarios, taking place in the period after the gold rush, as the people of California attempted to forge a new identity in a state that went through an irreversible transformation.

description: The “Projection Simulator” tool provides easy simulation for Sony projector installers and system integrators. The tool contains an interactive simulation of throw distances for each kind of lens and available lens shift range. Different aspect ratios between screen and projection image is also selectable. NOTE The simulator provides theoretical values based on entered dimensions. Real-world results may vary slightly due to tolerances.
