description: Teaching and learning to read English using synthetic phonics, for 5- to 8-year-olds. This is a fully featured free app that teaches beginning readers how to read, with a sample lesson on the sounds sh (/ʃ/), ch (/tʃ/), th (/θ/, /ð/) and ng (/ŋ/). The complete version, available for online subscription at www.e-unik.com.my/online, has 8 lessons for Level 1 and 7 lessons for Level 2. This app comprises 4 sections, viz., 1. Lesson 2. Word Smart 3. Let’s Practise 4. Let’s Say It 1. Lesson - Covers 3 crucial skills: • Recognizing sound-letter relationship Children are taught the phonemes /ʃ/, /tʃ/, /θ/, /ð/ and /ŋ/, and the letters that represent them. This knowledge is important in understanding grapheme-phoneme correspondence. • Blending sounds to form words Children are taught to blend sounds to form words. They say the sounds that make up a word and merge the sounds together until they can hear what the word is. This skill is vital in learning to read. • Segmenting words into individual sounds Children are also taught to segment, which is the opposite of blending. Children say a word and then break it up into the phonemes that make up the word. This skill is vital in being able to spell words. Children also learn to recognize specific “tricky” words – words that are not spelt or pronounced according to the phonic “rules” that they are taught. 2. Word Smart Covers lateral expansion of literacy development: Children listen to two tongue twisters, two rhymes, and a song. The tongue twisters, rhymes and song have sounds that the learner has just learnt. Words are highlighted in red as they are read out. 3. Let’s Practise Covers practice exercises that reinforce learning: Practice 1: A listening skill practice that develops children’s phonemic awareness. It tests their ability to identify and distinguish phonemes taught. Children are required to match letters to their phonemes. Practice 2: Children first listen to a word and then break it down to its constituent phonemes. The letters corresponding to the phonemes are then picked to spell out the word. This is a listening skill practice that tests children’s decoding ability. Practice 3: A listening skill practice that challenges children’s memory. Children are required to pair letters and their sounds. 4. Let’s Say It Covers sound recognition: Six words are introduced for each phoneme taught. Children can tap on the words to listen to their pronunciation. Help us improve this app. If you have suggestions or comments on how we can improve this app, whether in content or functionality, please send us your feedback. We value your input; it can make a world of difference to the learning experience of children using this app. e-mail us at: admin@e-unik.com.my

Can you save the marbles from passing the point of no return? In this game, your goal is to form groups of at least 3 identical marbles so as to destroy them and clear the line. At the start of each level, a line of color marbles will be rolling on the path of a maze and moving towards a hole at the end of the path. At the center of the maze you will be given a launcher, in which a marble is ready to be shot, and the next piece will also be seen. Move your mouse around so as to change the shooting direction, then click to release the marble. If groups of at least 3 marbles of the same color are formed, those marbles will be removed from the line and the remaining marbles will merge. You can switch the positions of the marbles in the launcher by pressing the Spacebar on your keyboard. Your score will be recorded at the top right corner of the screen. As you advance in the game, the mazes will become more complex and the number of marbles will increase. If the marbles fall into the hole, the game ends. Charge into the streams of excitement now!

description: Jeux éducatifs pour les enfants de 2 à 8 ans. Voix et textes en FRANCAIS. [Garantie sans virus et sans aucune publicité / vous pouvez tester ce jeu dans sa version gratuite] Ces 3 jeux, destinés aux enfants à partir de 2 ans, a la particularité de rendre l'enfant complètement autonome dans son apprentissage, même s'il ne sait pas lire, car il est uniquement réalisé à partir de symboles simples, et les instructions sont lues clairement (nécessité d’avoir du son). Ce jeu éducatif est entièrement en français (textes et voix). Il y a trois modes de jeux : - un jeu qui invite l'enfant à retrouver la bonne orthographe d'un mot (l'enfant va découvrir un animal, par exemple un chien, et trois orthographes du mot "chien" lui sont proposés. Il doit trouver quelle est la bonne orthographe.) - un jeu d'observation dans lequel l'enfant doit retrouver la bonne partie du corps d'un animal (l'enfant ne voit que le buste d'un animal, et doit retrouver l'arrière parmi plusieurs possibilités ; trois pour commencer, et six en fin de jeu.) - et un jeu pour apprendre à l'enfant à compter (Combien y-a-t'il d'animaux à l'écran ? La difficulté augmente progressivement. Au départ, il n'y aura que quelques animaux de la même famille, puis, des animaux de familles différentes pour développer l'attention et la concentration de l'enfant) Une musique très douce accompagne l’enfant dans son exercice, et à chaque fois qu’il répond juste, il est encouragé dans ses efforts par des applaudissements et des "bravo". L’interface a été spécialement conçue pour les enfants. Le style graphique est doux et coloré. Les éléments de l'interface se détachent de l’écran de manière beaucoup plus vive pour être bien identifiés par l'enfant. Ce jeu permettra à votre enfant d’apprendre, tout en s’amusant, à décrypter améliorer son orthographe, à aiguiser son sens de l'observation, et à s'initier au calcul... et surtout, il passera un très agréable moment. Chaque mini-jeu évolue progressivement. /* Si vous constatez un "bug", n'hésitez surtout pas à m'envoyer un mail : réponse assurée */ /* les mots d'encouragements sont aussi très très appréciés */ Pour l’anecdote, ce jeu a été réalisé pour ma fille de 3 ans et demi (très important, le "demi"). Et croyez-moi, ma fille est très "directe" (pour ne pas dire "sans pitié")... et je ne mets sur le Store que les jeux qui ont passé sa "validation"... Devant son succès, je l’ai mis sur le « Play Store ». Je suis sûr qu’il rendra vos enfants tout aussi heureux d’y jouer… Educational games for children from 2 to 8 years. Voices and texts in FRENCH. [Warranty virus free and no advertising / you can test the game in its free version] These three games for children from 2 years, has the distinction of making the child completely autonomous in their learning, even if he can not read because it is only made from simple symbols and instructions are read clearly (need sound). This educational game is entirely in French (text and voice). There are three game modes: - A game that invites children to find the correct spelling of a word (the child will discover an animal such as a dog, and three spellings of the word "dog" it offered must find what is right. spelling.) - An observation game in which the child has to find the right part of the body of an animal (the child sees only the bust of an animal, and must find the back of several possibilities, three to start, and six at the end of game) - And a game to teach children to count (How do I see animals on the screen The difficulty increases gradually Initially, there will be some animals of the same family, then. animals of different families to develop attention and concentration of the child) A very soft music accompanies the child in the exercise, and every time he just answers, it is encouraged in its efforts with applause and "Bravo". The interface has been specifically designed for children. The graphic style is soft and colorful. The interface elements are detached from the screen so much more vivid to be clearly identified by the child. This game will help your child to learn while having fun, to decipher improve his spelling, sharpening his sense of observation, and to initiate the calculation ... and most importantly, he spent a very pleasant time. Each mini-game is gradually changing. / * If you see a "bug", do not hesitate to send me an email: * guaranteed response / / * The words of encouragement are also very much appreciated * / For the record, this game was made for my daughter 3 years (very important, the "half"). And believe me, my daughter is very "direct" (not to say "no mercy") ... and I put on the Store that games that have passed its "validation" ... Due to their success, I put on the "Play Store". I'm sure your children will be just as happy to play it ...

description: Play Baby Hazel Parrot Care game on your favorite smartphone for free. Baby Hazel is fond of pet animals. As she wanted to keep a pet bird in her home, Baby Hazel’s uncle gifted her a parrot. Bruno, the pet puppy is jealous of Charlie, the parrot, as he sees Hazel paying more attention to him. So Bruno and Charlie keep frightening each other. Oh no…. today, Charlie got hurt when he had a petty fight with Bruno. He needs urgent treatment for the wound. Help Baby Hazel to treat Charlie for his wound. When he is cured, fill confidence in him to fly high again. Later pamper him by giving a birdie bath. Happy Birdie Day with Baby Hazel and Charlie!

Within the Arabic alphabet there are 28 letters. Seventeen basic chracters or symbols, represent the consonants. Eleven dots were then added sometime later to accommodate the need for vowel sounds, thus totalling 28 letters. Within the arabic laguage, the curved characters are always written right to left. It is thought that the Arabic script dates back to the 4th century AD. As the Islamic faith spread throughout the middle east, Arabic became the standard language and its use was widespread as early as the 7th century AD. The Qu'ran, the Holy Book of Islam states that writing is a gift from Allah (God) and as such it is to be revered. The art of calligraphy is also respected within Arabic culture. Please enjoy learning with my digital arabic calligraphy of the 28 letters, this app is based on swiping gestures and supports multi-touch.

Balloon numbers are educational game for your child. Balloons float numbers up, and the child must only touch them. When the kid beats the balloon is pronounced the number in English (child's voice). After earning a child all the numbers (from 1 to 20), played a cheerful tune with the repetition of all the numbers. There are 4 beautiful images that kids love. For each image is different melody. Numbers in two graphic styles. The application does not have a full screen ads. description: This app is dedicated to Amal :) This application contains Hanuman Chalisa performed by child artists form the movie "Return of Hanuman". Tulsi Das went to meet the then Emperor Akbar in Delhi after having had a darshan or vision of God Sri Rama in Gokul, the birth place of God Sri Krishna. The Emperor challenged Tulsi Das to show Sri Rama to him. When Tulsi Das replied that it was not possible without true devotion to Rama, he was imprisoned. In the prison, Tulsi Das wrote the beautiful verses of the Hanuman Chalisa on Sri Hanuman. When he completed the Hanuman Chalisa in prison, an army of monkeys menaced the city of Delhi. The Emperor unsuccessfully tried to control the monkeys with his forces. Finally, the Emperor realised that the monkey menace was a manifestation of the wrath of Hanuman, the Monkey God. He released Tulsi Das and the monkeys stopped their mischiefs immediately after Tulsi's release. Tulsi Das says in the Chalisa that whoever chants it with full devotion to Hanuman, will have Hanuman's grace. Amongst the Hindus of Northern India, it is a very popular belief that chanting the Hanuman Chalisa invokes Hanuman's divine intervention in grave problems, including those concerning evil spirits and this belief is based on the claim made in the Chalisa itself.

Aplikasi yang dapat digunakan sebagai alat bantu mengajarkankan suara dan nama binatang. Dengan aplikasi ini akan mempermudah pengenalan suara dan namanya. Aplikasi ini dilengkapi dengan suara dan gambar binatang dari abjad A sampai Z berkualitas baik. Dengan pendampingan yang baik Aplikasi ini dapat digunakan untuk menambah pengetahuan anak dan balita anda. Salam Applications that can be used as a tool mengajarkankan sounds and animal names. With this application will facilitate the introduction of sound and name. Our hope this application will have a positive effect on your toddler. Use of this application is very simple, in this application the child can see the type of animal that is displayed in the form of a grid view, each child chose pictures of animals then this application will display a larger image of the beast and presents the sound and the name of the animal. The application comes with sounds and images of animals of the alphabet A to Z of good quality. With good mentoring This application can be used to increase the knowledge of children and infants you. Regards

description: APERTURE LABORATORIES proudly presents Logo Me. With the Logo Me application you can conveniently change your device's bootlogo (not bootanimation) to a custom image with just a few simple clicks. You can secure your custom logo with a numeric lock code (up to 9 digits). Changing or restoring the logo will only be possible after the lock code has been entered. This will allow you to tag your device by including your name and contact info on your custom bootlogo. In case your device gets stolen the thief will be having a hard time selling it. Also if you lose your device the finder will know how to contact you. This application onlys work with the Galaxy Nexus GSM (maguro), Verizon (toro) and Sprint (toroplus). **** IMPORTANT **** Some custom ROMs come with a broken version of su and/or busybox. If you experience any problems with the app, before reporting the issue first try to fix it by installing Stericson's busybox (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=stericson.busybox) and SuperSU (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=eu.chainfire.supersu) and then updating the su binary in the SuperSU app. The app uses the build properties to identify the device. If you mess with the properties the device detection will fail and the app will return the error that your device is not compatible. Use this application at your own risk. The author is not responsible for any damage resulting from the use of this app. You can also get this app on Android Pit which accepts Paypal and other payment options: http://www.androidpit.com/en/android/market/apps/app/aperture.ezekeel.logome/Logo-Me
release_text: * Added new launcher icon by John Xionidis.

description: Att lära sig läsa kan vara en utmaning för både barnet och föräldrar. Som komplement och omväxling till den vanliga läxläsnings rutinerna kan man använda den här applikationen som är utvecklad att följa skolverkets riktlinjer för vilken kunskap man förväntar sig i årskurs ett. På PostIt lappen visas en mening eller en bild, och barnet har tre alternativ att välja mellan. Varje gång man svarar rätt så dyker en bit av en pingvin upp, och ju bättre barnet blir desto fler pingviner kan man hitta. Behöver man hjälp med frågan så trycker man på pingvinen, och en röst hjälper barnet med vad som finns på tavlan. Allt är på svenska. Spelet är enkelt och lätt att förstå samt kräver inget nätverk, vilket gör att man tex kan sitta i bilen och träna på att läsa. Spelet är för barn, och innehåller ingen reklam eller länkar till något som inte har något samband med applikationen. Spelets motor slumpar både svarsalternativen och frågorna, vilket gör att man inte kan memorera svaren, och spelet känns nytt varje gång man spelar. Titta gärna också på vår andra Lära Läsa App: Lära Läsa Årskurs 1 Alfabetet, eller på våra andra utbildnings-appar Learning to read can be a challenge for both the child and parents. Complementing and variety to the usual läxläsnings routines can use this application that is developed to follow the Ministry of Education's guidelines on what knowledge you would expect in year one. On PostIt note, a sentence or a photo, and the child has three options to choose from. Each time you answer correctly, so popping a bit of a penguin up, and the better the child gets, the more penguins can be found. If you need help with the issue press on the penguin, and a voice will help the child with what's on the board. Everything is in Swedish. The game is simple and easy to understand and requires no network, which means that for example can sit in your car and practice reading. The game is for children and contains no advertising or links to something that has no connection with the application. The game engine randomizing both answer choices and issues, which means that you can not memorize the answers, and the game feels new every time you play. Please look also at our second Learning Reading App: Teaching Reading Grade 1 Alphabet, or at our other educational apps

App för att beräkna vikten på hästar, välj mellan tre olika mätmetoder, fyll i värdena och appen räknar automatiskt ut vikten för dig. Tryck på fråga symbolen för vägledning om hur man mäter. App to calculate the weight of horses, choose between three different measurement methods, fill in the values ​​and the app automatically calculates the weight for you. Press question symbol for guidance on how to measure.
Multi-language Plan your show jumping competition Place barriers and direction Plan distance
Use the same tool that veterinarians and professional breeders. Choose between three different measurement methods and the application do all the calculations for you.

I årskurs ett lär man sig räkna, och lägger den matematiska grunden för hela skolgången. Alla barn har olika lätt för att lära sig räkna, vilket ställer stora krav på såväl barnet som för den som hjälper till. Som komplement och omväxling till den vanliga läxläsnings rutinerna kan man använda den här applikationen som är utvecklad att följa skolverkets riktlinjer för vilken kunskap man förväntar sig i årskurs ett. Applikationen är i första hand anpassad för 7” surfplattor med Android 4.x, men fungerar även på andra storlekar. Tänk även på att ställa in din Android enhet att visa ”full frame”. Varje gång man svarar rätt så äter ett litet får upp gräs för att hitta djuren som gömt sig, och ju bättre barnet blir desto fler borttappade djur kan man hitta. Behöver man hjälp med frågan så trycker man på trädet bredvid ladugården, och en röst hjälper barnet med vad svaret är. Allt är på svenska. Spelet är enkelt och lätt att förstå samt kräver inget nätverk, vilket gör att man tex kan sitta i bilen och träna på att räkna. Spelet är för barn, och innehåller ingen reklam eller länkar till något som inte har något samband med applikationen. Spelets motor slumpar både svarsalternativen och frågorna, vilket gör att man inte kan memorera svaren, och spelet känns nytt varje gång man spelar. In the first year you learn to count, and put the mathematical basis for the entire school. All children have different easy to learn counting, which places great demands on the child as for the assistant. Complementing and variety to the usual läxläsnings routines can use this application that is developed to follow the Ministry of Education's guidelines on what knowledge you would expect in year one. The application is primarily designed for 7 "tablet with Android 4.x, but also works on other sizes. Also remember to set your Android device to display "full frame". At the barn shown a count or number sequence, and the child has three options to choose from. Each time you answer correctly, so eating a little sheep up grass to find the animals hiding, and the better the child gets, the more lost animals can be found. If you need help with the issue press on the tree next to the barn, and a voice will help the child with what the answer is. Everything is in Swedish. The game is simple and easy to understand and requires no network, which means that for example can sit in the car and train on that count. The game is for children and contains no advertising or links to something that has no connection with the application. The game engine randomizing both answer choices and issues, which means that you can not memorize the answers, and the game feels new every time you play.

description: The Bill Book app allows you to store the elements that have an expiration date, with the possibility to add name, code and notes. It's possible to edit or delete an item entered through the appropriate section. You can then control the objects introduced and the individual dates in order of expiration date. You can also search all items that have a certain expiration date, and set how many days before the expiration date receive a visual and acoustic message when the app is opened (and when you return to the menu). In the future we will add exciting new features! Please report any bugs or suggestions to improve the app, thank you! Before closing the app always go back to the menu with the back button (automatically save data)

This physics app contains a concept summary of Motion, 20 quiz questions, and "Get Help" buttons on each question to help you if you need it. These apps are perfect for "studying on the go", and they are designed with that in mind. Covers 20 of the most essential questions on the physics of motion, including velocity, acceleration, projectile motion and graphical analysis. If you get stumped, instantly access hundreds of related Internet resources with the tap of a button. Do not take that test until you test yourself with this app! Whether you are in a high school conceptual physics class, an introductory college course, or you are taking a standardized test that is related to physics, the information contained in App Physics Review apps is absolutely essential to know in order to be successful. Be smart and take advantage of these convenient and effective review apps!

Do you have trouble sleeping? Is it hard for you to get into a peaceful mood? This White Noise app makes getting relaxed easy and fast! (Thunder and rain for example) It's as easy as a click of a button. Also you can adjust the volume to fit your mood, just slide the volume bar back or forward. These white noises will get you to sleep in record time!

Tired of taking notes with with your small mobile keyboard ? Tired of writing your SMS ? Speech To Text To Speech was made for you ! Speak in your phone's microphone, and let the app transcript your voice into text. Once it's done, you can correct the words if there are any mistake, then you can SMS the text, or play it with the Text to Speech function. You can also change the language for the Text To Speech.

Wind rose uses the digital compass of your phone / tablet to mark the north and give you information on the winds. To get accurate information the device needs to be placed on a plan, you just turn it to know the name of the wind that originates from that point of the compass. Fungerar även på surfplatta För att få delta i ridtävlingar i Sverige måste antingen ryttaren eller målsman inneha GRÖNT KORT. Appen innehåller flera av de kunskapsdelar man behöver för att klara Ridsportförbundets GRÖNT KORT utbildning. Grönt Kort appen innehåller -Träningsprov för Grönt Kort -Information om Grönt Kort -Ordlista med vanlig hästterminologi -Uppslagsverk med hästkunskap (bla sjukdomar, skötsel, avel, livscykel, utseende och anatomi) -Bild på Hästens Anatomi Alla under 18 år måste gå en Grönt Kort utbildning. Om man är över 18 år behöver man inte gå utbildningen, men man måste genomföra samtliga delprov. Från 13 års ålder kan man delta själv i Grönt Kort utbildning. Är man under 13 år kan man rida på målsmans eller myndig persons gröna kort (den vuxne ansvarar då för att barnet följer regler och riktlinjer vid tävlingar). Från det att man är 14 år och tänker delta i tävling behöver ryttaren eget grönt kort När man klarat Grönt kort får man ett intyg samt att det registreras i tävlingsdatabasen (TDB) Also works on tablet To participate in riding competitions in Sweden, either the rider or guardian hold GREEN CARD. The app contains a number of the knowledge parts you need to pass the Equestrian Federation GREEN CARD education. Green Card app contains -Training Sample for Green Card -Information on the Green Card -Glossary of regular horse terminology -Encyclopedia with horse knowledge (blah diseases, care, breeding, life cycle, appearance and anatomy) -Picture of Horse Anatomy All under 18 must get a Green Card training. If you are over 18, you do not attend the program, but you have to implement all parts. From the age of 13 can join in the Green Card training. If you are under 13, you can ride on parental authority or person's green card (the adult is then responsible for the child to follow the rules and guidelines at competitions). From the time the man is 14 years old and intending to participate in contest requires the rider's own green card When they passed the Green card to get a certificate, and that it is registered in the competition database (TDB)

LÄXHJÄLPEN är en app som kan användas som komplement och omväxling i läxläsningen. Det är många gånger stressigt att hinna med läxorna när man kommer hem från aktiviteter eller sena eftermiddagar, och läxorna blir ett stressmoment både för föräldrarna och barnen. Vilket kan leda till att skola och läxorna blir ett negativt moment på dagen. LÄXHJÄLPEN passar utmärkt om man skall lära sig sifferkompisar, dubblor, gångertabellen, räkna med minus och plus. LÄXHJÄLPEN är en app som ni kommer använda i flera terminer. Att läsa läxa varje dag kan vara en utmaning för både barnet och föräldrar. Som komplement och omväxling till den vanliga läxläsnings rutinerna kan man använda den här applikationen. När läxorna blir enformiga eller man behöver omväxling i läxorna är LÄXHJÄLPEN ett utmärkt verktyg. LÄXHJÄLPEN behöver ingen uppkoppling, vilket innebär att man t.ex. kan träna på veckans läxa när man sitter i bilen eller bussen. Homework is an app that can be used to complement and variety in homework. It is often stressful to keep up with their homework when they get home from activities or late afternoons, and homework becomes a stress factor for both parents and children. Which may lead to school homework and is a negative torque on the day. Homework is ideal if one is to learn numerical buddies, doubles, times table, expect minus and plus. Homework is an app that you will use for several semesters. Reading homework every day can be a challenge for both the child and parents. Complementing and variety to the usual läxläsnings routines can use this application. When homework is getting monotonous or you need variety in their homework is homework a great tool. Homework requires no connections, which means that eg can work on this week's homework while sitting in a car or bus.

LEARN COUNTING Step 1 is part of a series of educational games for children developed by JMAppar as a complement, support and variety to the regular homework. The app contains no in-app purchases, advertisement or third party links. Learn to Count first grade is a fun educational game helping children learning addition, subtraction and the multiplication table. The game is easy and designed in a way that allows children to play by themselves. The game presents a question and five different answer options. If you pick the right answer you also solve different puzzles with funny pictures. As a parent or teacher you can choose the difficulty level of the math tasks to adjust properly to your student or child.
Find the cute animals. Scrape the picture, and see which animals are hiding.

Träna på medicinska ord och medicinsk terminologi i denna app utvecklad för och tillsammans med SSK-studenter. Appen är ett sk flash-card spel, där man får en fråga, med tre svarsalternativ. Vid varje rätt svar samlar man poäng, samtidigt som man löser olika pussel. Appen riktar sig i första hand till de som studerar till sjuksköterska, läkare eller medicin. Titta gärna på våra andra utbildnings-appar från JMAPPAR. Practice the medical words and medical terminology in this app developed for and together with the CCF students. The app is a 'flash card game, where you get a question with three possible answers. With each correct answer, points are earned, while solving various puzzles. The app is aimed primarily at those studying to be a nurse, doctor or medicine. Please look at our other educational apps from JMAPPAR.

description: STEG 1 Här lär man sig alfabetet, och vilken ordningsföljd bokstäverna har. När man trycker på bokstaven så hör man ljudet från bokstaven och en bild där bokstaven ingår visas. I den tidiga inlärningsfasen handlar det mycket om att kunna associera en bokstav till ett ljud STEG 2 Här lär man sig ordningsföljden i alfabetet. Man får en ordningsföljd av bokstäver där en bokstav fattas, och man skall välja vilken bokstav som fattas. När man trycker på en bokstav, hör man ljudet från bokstaven. STEG 3 Här lär man sig använda bokstäverna genom att stava enkla ord. När man trycker på en bokstav, hör man ljudet från bokstaven. Och när man trycker på bilden så hör man vilket ord som skall stavas. Titta gärna också på våra andra skola-appar: LÄXHJÄLPEN | MATEMATIK, eller på våra andra utbildnings-appar Lära Läsa Årskurs 1 Alfabetet ingår i serien Lära Läsa Åk1 från JMappar och är tänkt som komplement, stöd och omväxling till den vanliga läxan. Appen följer de riktlinjer och rekommendationer som finns i Skolverkets Lgr11 angående kunskapsmål för Årskurs ett. Appen innehåller över 300 bilder och ljud på svenska STEP 1 Here you learn the alphabet, and what order the letters have. When you press the letter you hear the sound of the letter and a picture where the letter is included is. In the early learning phase, it is very much about being able to associate a letter into a sound STEP 2 Here you learn the sequence of the alphabet. You get a sequence of letters where one letter is taken, you must choose which letter is missing. When you press a letter, hear the sound of the letter. STEP 3 Here you learn to use the letters by spelling simple words. When you press a letter, hear the sound of the letter. And when pressed on the picture to hear the word to be spelled. Please look also at our other school-apps: Homework | MATHEMATICS, or at our other educational apps Teaching Reading Grade 1 Alphabet included in the series Learning Reading AK1 from JMappar and is meant to complement, support and variety to the usual homework. The full-color illustrations and vast assortment of activities in each unit of Smart Phonics allow the learners to develop their reading and writing skills. The fun chants following each unit will engage the learners’ interests while facilitating vocabulary acquisition. The app provides helpful pronunciations of the target letters and sounds, as well as activating computer-based learning skills. ◆ Level 1 Single Letters ◆ a, b, c, d, e, f, g, h, i, j, k, l, m, n, o, p, q, r, s, t, u, v, w, x, y, z [Features] - Easy and fun stories to review new sounds, letters, and words - Activities to build listening, reading, and writing skills - Fun rhyming chants following each unit for additional exposure - Review units that include fun puzzles to solidify learning Composition 1. Games: Learners have chances to review through various activities and puzzles. ◆ Universal app : can be used both in Phone and Pad with a single purchase. 　 ◆ App inquiry : for payment error and problems pertaining to app ( helpdesk@bluepin.co.kr ) ◆◆Notice from Bluepin◆◆ Greetings! As the manager of Bluepin, I’d like to take this opportunity to thank everyone who has shown interest and support to our apps. Usually, customers post their inquiries regarding app usage in a form of a review, and our only means of responding to such an inquiry was replying to those review. However, due to technical problems in posting our responses or delay, customer support was not provided in a timely manner. To better serve our customers, we have opened the Bluepin Customer Support Center to process our customer inquiries as quickly and efficiently as possible. Please contact helpdesk@bluepin.co.kr for inquiries and problems pertaining to apps. When contacting customer support, please read the following for quicker response to your inquiry. 　 (1) Contacting customer support by phone -To send an inquiry from your device, go to your phone app’s info and select helpdesk@bluepin.co.kr . (2) Contacting customer support by internet - For online inquiry, please include store of purchase, name of purchased app, device in use, and the OS version for faster response. 　 Thank you.

description: Veja a anatomia do corpo humano em 3D, a nomenclatura, forma e posicionamento. Totalmente em português!(* modelo feminimo contido nesta versão inclui apenas o sistema reprodutor.) Sugestão: Antes de adquirir este software expermente a versão demo, oferecida para que os usuários possam testar a compatibilidade do software ao seu dispositivo e conhecer as funcionalidades. Este software foi projetado como um recurso adicional para o aprendizado de anatomia e não deve ser utilizado como fonte única de informação. See the anatomy of the human body in 3D, the nomenclature, shape and positioning. The software allows a male * rotate three-dimensional model with all systems, allowing viewing at any angle, through layers and with different combinations. Fully in Portuguese! (* Feminimo model contained in this release includes only the reproductive system.) Tip: Before you buy this expermente software demo version offered so that users can test the compatibility of the software to your device and learn about the features. Real Piano is designed for you to learn to play piano on your mobile device with realistic sounds . 1 . Contains 30 white keys and 21 black keys . 2 . You can change keys at any time using the image of the lower piano that sits just above the keys . 3 . Direct sound control in the application and does not need to change the sound on your mobile device button. 4 . The black button with arrow pointing down indicates the rotation of the sound, and you can choose the type of rotation , just by a click on this button and select from the list the rotation that suits you . 5 . Knob with red circle , used to record the sound . To record just press this button and start playing the music on the piano . 6 . Red square button is the button to stop recording . After we finished the song must press this button to stop recording . 7 . Red triangle button , used to play the music you recorded . Have fun with this great game. Submit your question or feedback on using this application to us. Our email : couldsys@gmail.com So come on, let's play the piano .

description: Main Features: - Record movie and take picture in the following ways: (1) Protected (safer), (2) Unprotected or (3) Hidden (faster). - Spy camera through the Widgets: - Take pictures and record videos without opening the application screen. - Select the icon (mammoth, pen, penguin, transparent etc) and the label of the widget. - Hide/Displays WhatsApp photos and videos or any other folder from the Gallery. - Setting up Flash, rear and front camera, auto focus and vibration. - Take picture and record video by pressing the volume button. - Take consecutive pictures for a predetermined time or until the user click stop. - Record video for a predetermined time. - Save and recovery the passwords into/from PhotoCrypt server. - Use multiple passwords. You change your passwords at any time, but your protected files will be accessible only if you are logged in the corresponding password. - Use the AES encryption algorithm to protect the files. - List protected\unprotected\visible\hidden files from device\Dropbox. - Select\unselect files based on existing in Device\Dropbox. - Sort files by name, date, type and size. - Copy\Move to Server\Device, Protect\Unprotect, Delete and Share files. - View pictures and videos with or without subtitle, swipe, zoom, multi touch and rotate. - Hide application! The Crypt Photo icon is hidden and the application may be called by dialing 4444. - Overwrite, skip or rename files with the same name. - Filter files by folder and by visibility. - Automatic services of Upload, protect and hide files. - Detects pictures taken by the native camera and shows a decision-making screen. - PhotoCrypt Desktop ( http://goo.gl/RUwoUS ) allows you to protect\unlock your files directly from your computer (PC). How to do: take your protected files in PhotoCrypt folder on your device or download the protected files form your Dropbox account to your computer and unprotect using PhotoCrypt Desktop.

L-Price ou Lista de Preço, é um excelente aplicativo que tem como objetivo ajudá-lo a economizar e organizar suas compras de supermercado. O L-Price vem com diversas funcionalidades faceis e práticos de serem usados e manipulados para que você possa ter sucesso na sua economia. O Sistema L-Price, está representado em 5 módulos, são eles: - Cadastrar de Produto Este módulo você pode cadastrar todos os seu produtos de acorco com as categoria de cada um dos mesmos. O sistema irá exibir uma listagem de categoria, selecione a categoria específica e pressione o botão "+" no canto superior da tela. Antes de informar a descricão do produto, primeiramente pressione em uma imagem que está representada como uma estrela, para verificar se existe alguma imagem para representar o seu produto, se tiver pressione a imagem específica, caso não tenha, então pressione novamente a imagem estrela. - Cadastrar Loja Este módulo você pode cadastrar todos os supermercados ou lojas aonde as compras serão realizadas. - Ir as Compras Este módulo é o carrinho virtual. Nessa etapa você deve escolher o supermercado aonde a compra será realizada, e logo após, o sistema irá exibir uma tela que irá representar o seu carrinho real, nessa tela irá conter todos os seus produtos e informações de detalhado dos preços de cada produto presente no seu carrinho, e além do valor total de pagamento. Para adicionar um produto no carrinho você tem duas formas de fazer esse procedimento. O primeiro é, quando o carrinho estiver vazio o sistema mostra a opção de adicionar no carrinho os produtos pre-selecionados, que o usuário realizou no menu "Selecionar Produtos". E o Segundo você deve pressionar em uma imagem que representa um carrinho de compras, logo após, o sistema exibirá uma tela de categoria, você escolhe a categoria do produto que você quer adicionar, o sistema irá mostrar uma listagem de todos os produtos pertencente a essa categoria , selecione o seu produto (Caso, o produto ainda não esteja cadastrado, basta você pressionar o butão "+" no canto superior da tela e cadastrar o seu produto), o sistema irá exibir novamente uma tela de detalhamento no qual você irá informar: - Embalagem do produto pressionando no campo "unidade"; - O valor unitário (preço) do produto Obs: informar o valor que está na prateleira ou na gondola; - E a quantidade que deseja levar, e o sistema calcula automaticamente quanto você vai pagar, para que você não possa ter algum susto na boca do caixa. Caso esteja tudo certo você pressione no butão "Adicionar no Carrinho" o sistema retornará a tela de listagem de produtos para que você possa adicionar outros produtos. Pronto! você já adicionou um produto no carrinho. O sistema L-Price, lhe proporciona tambem, após a segunda compra, você comparar o valor do produto com a compra passada independente de supermercado. - Compras Realizadas Este módulo o sistema informa todo o históricos de compras realizadas, informa a data da compra realizada, os supermercados aonde foram realizadas essas compras e a listagem de produtos comprados com seus respectivos preços e o valor total do carrinho. - Selecionar Produtos Este módulo o sistema lista todos os produtos cadastrados de acordo com suas categorias, para que o usuário possa selecionar os produtos mais comprados. Por favor, classifique app L-Price, entre em contato conosco com qualquer pergunta que possa ter. Obrigado. Embark on an epic quest full of fantasy and adventure in Puzzle Heroes! Crawl into dungeons and solve puzzles to fight and beat dreadful monsters willing to put an end to the journey of your hero. Pack your things because it is time to go! Puzzle Heroes is an exciting combination of match-3 puzzle and RPG adventure. A turn-based game filled with action, lots of upgrades and also a surprising plot! Choose from a variety of heroes to play with and battle the legendary creatures along your way, including: the Paladin, the Archer, the Dwarf, the Mage and the Knight. Fight rats, bats, blobs, goblins, dark elves, dragons and more! HOW TO PLAY Swipe and match 3 swords or more to fight the monsters. Match 3 or more shields to defend your hero. Do the same with gems, it will work too! With gems you can upgrade your character to face stronger monsters. Use them wisely! HIGHLIGHTS • Missions: fun tasks to complete along your journey to earn experience and gems -- you’ve never seen anything like this! • Great selection of heroes to play with • Fun combination of puzzle and RPG genres • Quick and simple gameplay • Suitable for all ages Solve puzzles and fight mystical creatures. All the things a true fantasy game needs! Puzzle Heroes is free, download now and embark into this adventure! Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

description: Kittens, rabbits, foxes and squirrels may seem very cute and inoffensive at a first sight. But all they really want to do is bring down your empire! Not only fight their attack back but also leave no stone standing on their castle! Bring it down! Just don't let yourself be fooled by kawaii creatures because cuteness kills here! Unlock new characters throughout the game and discover every character unique abilities. Your army of very skilled animals is just waiting for your command to battle! HIGHLIGHTS • Strong and skilled soldiers: Sword Cat, Hammer Dog, Axe Wolf, Katar Fox, Pike Bunny, Bomb Parrot, Sling Squirrel, Shooter Ferret and Knuckle Bear • Unlock special weapons like swords, hammers, axes and slings • Magic skills like freezing and thunder • 9 different units with unique abilities • 53 epic quests to complete • Upgradeable skills & godly powers Please note! O Mundo de Wumpus, é um jogo fácil de se jogar, ele exije um pouco de raciocinio lógico do agente que será você! Bem! O jogo ele é um tabuleito 4 por 4 composto por 4 elementos, sendo que, eles estão distribuidos como: - 1 Agente - 3 Buracos - 1 Wumpus - 1 Ouro O Objetivo do jogo é encontrar o "Ouro" sem cair no "Buraco" e nem ser pego pelo "Wumpus". O Agente poderá se deslocar somente para frente e para os lados e não poderá se deslocar na diagonal e muito menos voltar para o passo anterior pois ficara marcado com uma pegada exceto que a posição do agente seja vizinho da posição inicial. A cada posição do agente ele irá sentir algumas sensações tas como: - Nenhuma Sensação; O caminho está livre o agente pode se deslocar tranquilo. - Você esta Sentindo Vento; Cuidado em um dos caminhos pode estar um "Buraco". - Você esta sentindo Fedor; Cuidado em um dos caminhos pode estar um "Wumpus". - Você esta sentindo Vento e Fedor. Cuidado em um dos caminhos pode estar um "Buraco" e um outro caminho pode está o "Wumpus". Caso, o agente cair no "Buraco" ou ser pego pelo "Wumpus", pode-se pressionar novamente na "Posiçãi inicial", o sistema iniciará novamente, mas, mantendo a mesma estratérigia do jogo. Ou seja, vai manter os elementos (Buraco,Wumpus e o Ouro) na mesma posição. Agora se for pressionada o butão "Iniciar Jogo" o sistema montará uma nova estrátégia de jogo, modificando todas as posições dos elementos. Os elesemtos são representados através de cores são elas: Branco: Posição Inicial do Agente. Azul: Significa que o agente está seguro. Laranga: Significa, alerta, que o agente está em perigo. Preto: Siginifica o "Buraco". Vermelho: Significa o "Wumpus". Amarelo: Significa o "Ouro". With detailed information of around 10 museums and more than 225 featured attractions along with 1000s of other Points of Interest carefully integrated with every single travel activity, San Francisco Travel - Pangea Guides is power packed with utilities and information. From Facebook Check-Ins to local event information, offline map to intuitive Augmented Reality experience, we have brought most of the travel activities and application needs to one single app. Save precious travel time rather than switching between several apps and utilities! • Practical travel guide with detailed information like attractions, getting around for each district of San Francisco City. • Travel utilities like hotel booking, currency converter, weather forecast, world clocks, reminder, alarm and many more available within the app. • Intuitive, easy-to-use one tap pane interface with tight social network integration for Check-Ins, photo sharing and places review. • Just one app for all your devices with dedicated UI and data sync capabilities. • Plan your itinerary and port your activity data between different devices and social network using our pangeaguides.com website. • Community sharing experience for your photos, reviews and travel memories with your friends and other fellow travelers. Premium features of San Francisco Travel Guide bring exclusive travel utilities that reduce travel planning hassles and make the experience fun and memorable. Premium features consists of - • A next generation modern marvel Augmented Reality experience that brings surrounded by wonders feeling. • Search for cafes, restaurants, theatres and even hospitals with carefully organized location data. Find more than 1000 Points of Interest around you and get directions to places of your interest. • Extremely detailed San Francisco offline map for no connectivity areas or internet availability (Connection required on first time use). • Comprehensive set of utilities and tools that will help you plan your trip. Organize checklist, send postcards, bringing a collection of useful travel apps within a single app. • Discover people, places and culture with information about upcoming local events. Designed and developed by the travelers, for the travelers that works in all parallel universe!
release_text: • Introducing Social Sharing. Now share places you are visiting using Facebook and Twitter. • Improved Offline capability from the moment it is installed. • Tightly integrated with Facebook for places Check-Ins. • Improved Photo Albums and sharing capabilities. • One touch localization for currency weather and measurement units. • Emergency phone numbers data updated. • Improved social features for group travel.

description: Adopt your own Virtual Pet! Enjoy Amazing 3D graphics and animation. WHAT YOU CAN DO WITH PUPPY: ★ Tap his face, feet, hands, ears or nose and watch his reactions! ★ Rub his belly and head! ★ Try to swipe your finger in different directions! ★ Hold "MIC" button and talk, he will repeat everything with a funny voice! ★ Take photo and share with friends! ★ Unlock new fur and Customize your pet! . No in-app purchases, everything is available for Free! We're always listening to your suggestions to improve our game.

Snooz-A-Mole is a brand new game in the Mr Snoozleberg universe! In this whack-a-mole type game, Mr Snoozleberg is back and once more he’s on an ultra-secret mission: bringing an ultra-secret suitcase to an ultra-secret place. But hey, our sleepwalking diplomat needs a hand to reach his goal, because the «Moles» are working hard to catch the precious ultra-secret thing. Luckily, there’s miss Worrysum doing extra time to protect Mr Snoozleberg, so be careful not to whack the lady out. Feel free to treat yourself with Albino, each time you hit the crocodile you earn extra points. Get special bonus when you catch many «Moles» in a row. But most of all, don’t hit Mr. Snoozleberg, cause you shall never, ever wake up a sleepwalker on duty. Based on the famous Mr Snoozlberg, Snooz-a-mole is game for all ages. The simple and intuitive game mechanic can be played as a single player or on a collaborative mode with an extra pair of hands, so don’t be shy to ask the help of a friend to improve your score. Be sure to come back regularly to get the weekly comic strip, as the Snooz-A-Mole plot unfolds every week! So sit back and «snooze» all these pesky moles!

Subway Run 3D is an addictive endless runner games. Keep moving forward by evading the trains and other obstacles and collect coins and other goodies on your way. Subway Run 3D presents, - Beautiful Graphics - Different types of obstacles - addictive music - Coins and other pickup boosts like double jump to make the game more fun - smooth swipe controls - simple and addictive game play Do not forget to Log in to google+ to share your score with your friends and world wide. Summers Update : The winters and the Christmas is over, the frozen ice has melted and the summer season is upon us. Enjoy the bright days and warm environment while jumping and dashing through the busy streets filled with traffic cars. Jump over the cars and the containers and collect as many coins as you can. your target is to chase your friends high score and sprint as far as you can. Features : - New Music track - Summer environment - new and day graphics Follow Us : http://plus.google.com/108120617698898667883/ https://www.facebook.com/BringitOnFreeApps

description: Development Dialogue is a platform for social entrepreneurs to showcase their proven ideas and programs that have transformed the local and international communities. The conference brings together diverse participants including: for-profits, not-for-profits, global visionaries, as well as local communities to share proven models, innovations, and transforming perspectives. The 7th annual Development Dialogue between 20th and 22nd January will focus on ‘Counting What Matters’ and invite you to deliberate on what counts the most for the people and the ecosystems that we are creating the change for. The Key Note speakers of the Development Dialogue 2014 are Mr. Jairam Ramesh, Mr. Deep Joshi, Mr. T.V. Mohandas Pai, Mr. Kimmane Rathnakar and Mr. R.V. Deshpande.

User Manual: http://www.maxhirn.at/web/RadarContact_UserManual.pdf NEW: Version 6.3 features a new airport and turn direction assignments! For other news see the "New Features" section below. See the help section in the app for details. IMPORTANT UPDATE: If the speech output of "non-native-english" airlines like Lufthansa, Alitalia etc. sounds strange, please make sure you have all needed languages (French, German, Italian) installed: Settings -> Language & Input -> Text-to-Speech Output -> Settings -> Install voice data IMPORTANT: This app may be incompatible with the app "Launcher Pro". If it should crash after using "Launcher Pro", try starting RadarContact from the normal Android home screen. This is more a simulation than an arcade game. However, you will find every information required in the help section so you can try being an air traffic controller even without previous aviation knowledge! Important Note: This application is optimized for tablets! It should run on any screen size and resolution. On small screens however, usability may be restricted. Please try the free trial version before if in doubt. It is restricted to 15 aircraft per session and one airport. - Control arrival and departure traffic (40 different airlines) at eight airports - Assign headings, altitudes and speeds - Clear Direct-To and into holdings - Use RNAV transitions at selected airports - Lead aircraft onto the instrument landing system - Independent parallel approaches on some airports - Handle occasional missed approaches - Handle occasional emergencies - Guide departures to their exit waypoint - Observe minimum vectoring altitudes - Deal with significant weather and aircraft avoidance headings - Close and open your sector to handle heavy traffic - Start with one airport, then unlock the other ones as your career progresses - Customize datatags - Zoom - Measure success with a score system - Upload your score (if desired) to compare with other players - Hear audio readback of aircraft - Save and load games IMPORTANT NOTE: Custom firmwares may not be compatible with this app! The following devices have been found incompatible so far due to memory/display issues causing crashes: - Samsung Galaxy Ace (GT-S5830, GT-S5830i, GT-S5839i) - Samsung Galaxy Ace Duo (GT-S6802) - Samsung Galaxy Y (GT-B5510 and B5512, GT-S5360) - Samsung Galaxy Y Duo (GT-S6102) - Samsung Galaxy Pocket (GT-S5300, GT-S5300B) - Samsung Galaxy Mini (GT-S5570, GT-S5570I) - HTC Wildfire, Glacier and Thunderbolt - Huawei Ideos, U8350, M835, U8180, Ascend - Sony Ericsson LT18i - Coolpads 8... model numbers - LGE Pecan - BCM 2157 - Toshiba AT300 - Alcatel OneTouch 890D, 983
release_text: Version 6.3: Turn direction for heading clearances can now be assigned - this feature can be switched on and off in the TFC/RTS menu; new airport (Nice); bug fixes. For details see the help section in the app or the user manual.

description: ★ Hyperlight has got nominations for "Most Innovative Game of the Year" and "Xperia PLAY Game of the Year" by PocketGamer! ★ Sony Xperia™ PLAY optimized! Take control of the Hyperlight and burn your enemies faster-than-light in this innovative, psychedelic and super-fast retro arcade space shooter! ******************** "A brilliant, fast-paced ram-'em-up that fits perfectly onto Xperia Play, and offers hours of high score-chasing fun." PocketGamer.co.uk "Factor in tight controls and sharp neon graphics, and you have a leading candidate for App Store game of the year." MoDojo.com "Hyperlight is a unique experience with outstanding HD visuals, all for a low price. It might be difficult, but it can easily be mastered with some practice. Definitely check it out!" Appolicious.com "Hyperlight is a feast for the senses and a worthy successor to the twin-stick shooters that led up to this title." AppSpy.com "Beyond a doubt, Hyperlight offers an immense amount of gameplay. Add a tasty difficulty and two different game modes, and what you have is a piece of iOS gaming art." TheiPhoneAppReview.com "Overall the game gives you complete value for your money. Hyperlight is a kind of game you will end up playing for hour’s non-stop." iPhoneFootPrint.com "It’s an exciting, adrenaline-pumping game that eschews traditional shooter gameplay!" FreshApps.com "Hyperlight for Android definitely ranks in my top three experiences with a arcade space shooter" - AppEggs.com ******************** Take control of the Hyperlight in this psychedelic cosmic environment where countless evil beings try to destroy you, the last human fighter. However, your ship posses an incredible power! If successfully used, it can wipe out all your foes: it can travel at faster-than-light speed (FTL) making it impossible for anyone to catch it and is also able to disintegrate everything it touches! With simple gestures, you can move your spaceship at regular speed but also turn on its FTL engine to perform incredibly rapid attacks! Controls are simple and you can choose from touch only controls, tilt only or the exotic tilt & touch. There are also dozens of power-ups and weapons you can easily activate simply by gathering them on the battlefield. Hyperlight is easy to play but hard to master, there are so many ways to improve your skills that you will find yourself playing it for months! For a complete list of all the gameplay secrets of this game see the guide included! Can you survive these incredible hordes of enemies? Enemies will try to do everything to stop you, assuming several attack formations, different strategies, also leaving powerful dimensional trails on the battlefield that only at FTL speed you can cross! And watch out for the evil commanders: huge bosses await the Hyperlight in the dark corners of the universe! ★ Features ★ * Universal App: runs in HD on high-res Android devices. * Extremely innovative gameplay: burn your enemies faster-than-light! * 3 Control systems to meet your taste: Virtual Joystick, Tilt only and Tilt & Touch. * Stunning 2.5D neon-style graphics, effects and animated backgrounds. * Arcade mode with 40 different levels. * Infinity mode for an endless fun. * Several huge bosses to face. * Exciting techno and rock musics! * Google Play Games support with leaderboards and 24 achievements! For any problem with the game contact us at: support@catfishbluesgames.com --------------------------------------------------- Enjoy our LATEST games: - Brave Knight Rush - Devil Slayer Gunman - Caveman Dino Rush - Alien Apocalypse - Zombies After Me! - Deadly Moto Racing
Make your phone brighter! Set these lovely wallpaper! These wallpapers are 3D (parallax) effect. If you like this wallpapers support us estimate on Google Play.

We are glad to announce that on March 6, 2013, this software package has been given 5 Stars Award by soft82.com editors. Awards are given to products that they think are excellent and above average in their category. Outlook Contacts Transfer / Sync software gives you better control than most other sync software. It lets you decide which side (phone or PC) has more reliable data and start the sync from there. This software package consists of 2 components: one component running on your Android downloaded from Google Play and one component running on your PC downloaded from the developer's web site. The user interface, running on Windows, cannot be simpler and no configuration is required. This is the free version for your trial. If you have already installed the drivers for your Android device on your PC, installing this software package is a breeze. Here are the features: 1.Support all languages (including European and Asian) encoded in Unicode. 2.Preserve more Outlook data fields than most other sync software. E.g. The IM addresses and Notes fields are preserved. 3.Works with or without Google Sync. Google Sync is the default in later Android versions. 4.Does not interfere with syncing from other third parties like Skype. 5.Compatible with Android Version 2.2 to Version 4.2. 6.It can handle up to 1000 contacts. Software Versions supported: Windows versions supported: Windows XP, Windows 7, and Windows 8. Outlook versions supported: Outlook 2003, Outlook 2007, Outlook 2010, and Outlook 2013 Android versions supported: Version 2.2 to Version 4.2 inclusive. Requirement: Android Debug Bridge (ADB) driver for your device installed on your PC. See below for details. Installation 1.Download OL_Contacts_Transfer_Trial from Google Play. After installation, run the app and click [Check license] to make sure your software license is delivered to your phone. 2.Download Transfer_Trial_Console software from product web site and install on your PC. 3.Connect your Android to your PC and run the Console software. About USB Android Debug Bridge (ADB) Driver Your Android device requires several drivers to communicate to your PC. One of the drivers is called the ADB driver which allows your PC to communicate to the databases in your Android device. The USB ADB driver should be installed automatically on Windows 7 and newer OS. In order to trigger automatic driver installation, USB Debugging should be enabled on your Android device before connecting to your PC. Please see below on how to enable USB Debugging. On Windows XP, the driver has to be downloaded and installed manually. Here is a link to find the OEM drivers: http://developer.android.com/tools/extras/oem-usb.html#Drivers For Nexus products, do not go to the Manufacturer's web site. Get the driver from Google through this link: http://developer.android.com/sdk/win-usb.html#download For Samsung Galaxy products, you may have to search in the web with these key words: "Samsung Galaxy ADB Driver". Modify these key words according to your device. Please also note that Windows 7/8 may install the wrong driver for newer products. Please search the web for ADB driver issues for your specific device. We encourage you to complain to the manufacturers about their quality on drivers support. How to Enable USB Debugging USB Debugging must be enabled on your Android phone for this software to work. The procedure to enable it depend on your Android version: - On devices running Android 3.2 or older, you can find the option under Settings > Applications > Development. - On Android 4.0 and newer, it's in Settings > Developer options. Note: On Android 4.2 and newer, Developer options is hidden by default. To make it available, go to Settings > About phone and tap Build number seven times. Return to the previous screen to find Developer options.
release_text: V2.0 updated to support the latest Android version.

description: Controlled Contacts allows you to easily capture a perfect contact portrait photo and enter new contact information on your Android™ phone. Controlled Contacts is fully compatible with Android and Google contacts. Controlled Contacts uses time tested image recognition and our exclusive portrait generation algorithms to create perfect portraits of the persons that you photograph with your Android™ phone. These Android generated photos are then used for the Caller ID of that contact. Controlled Contacts is useful at work group and networking meetings, or during professional, social, or family gatherings and parties, to quickly capture photos of new contacts that you meet and enter essential information about that contact. When you take a photo with Controlled Contacts, the application automatically processes the photo into a perfect portrait of your new contact. After the photo is taken you can then enter the new contact’s information and add it to your Contacts list or update an already existing contact’s photo and information. If you have a contact that is not available for a contact photo in person, you can use photo prints of family and friends to capture a contact photo with Controlled Contacts. Controlled Contacts has the following features: -The ability to open and edit Contacts -The ability to select a saved image for portrait processing -The ability to open saved Portraits for review and can send the photo to others via email, Gmail, Facebook, Twitter, and other social sharing applications -The ability to process a new photo now or wait, allowing you to take more contact pictures during busy gatherings -The ability to set Camera Settings including camera sound Two versions of Controlled Contacts are available; Controlled Contacts Lite, which allows you to test the application to see if it is useful for you, and a Controlled Contacts Pro. The Lite version is fully functional though is Ad based and only allows one photo to be processed per application session and does not allow you to set camera settings. The Pro version has no Ads and allows you to take and process as many photos as you'd like to make the most of your contact gathering experience. Controlled Contacts was written for the Android™ 2.2 platform and fully tested on these devices for proper operation: o T-Mobile® G2™ with Google™ o Sprint™ Samsung Epic™ 4G Though we test our software thoroughly we know bugs can slip through. Controlled Capture Systems welcomes any and all bug reports to help us provide to you with top quality software and applications. If you find a bug, please send us a detailed list of actions that you performed in the application to receive the error. This will allow us to replicate your bug in-house so that we can fix it quickly and provide you an update. TAGS: Contact icon, Contact photo, Caller ID,
release_text: Now supports Android Jellybean. Improvements to application and updated image processing for better portrait generation.

description: Ever wanted to be a forklift driver? Do you have the coordination and skill to move the packages to the correct place? Well in Forklift Sim you can show exactly what you can do. Pick of the parcels carefully and rise the arm. Move back slowly and try to place them on the bench. If you get them all in the correct place. It's level complete. So what are you waiting for start driving your 3D Forklift in this awesome simulation game now!

3D Robot Defense is an epic fighting game. Defend yourself from a variety of beasts and creatures in this action packed defense game. If you love to take control of a mech and show what you can do. Go shooting everything you see. Change weapons, upgrade fire power and just see how long you can survive. Robot games have never been so fun!

The Interpretation of Dreams is a book by psychoanalyst Sigmund Freud. The first edition describes his work thus: "In the following pages, I shall demonstrate that there is a psychological technique which makes it possible to interpret dreams, and that on the application of this technique, every dream will reveal itself as a psychological structure, full of significance, and one which may be assigned to a specific place in the psychic activities of the waking state. Further, I shall endeavour to elucidate the processes which underlie the strangeness and obscurity of dreams, and to deduce from these processes the nature of the psychic forces whose conflict or co-operation is responsible for our dreams."

Want to know what you have to pay for your mortgage? Calculate your mortgage loan costs easily with this free mortgage calculator. Just enter the loan amount, loan term and interest rate and press Calculate. -Various mortgage types are supported: amortization, interest only and linear mortgages. -A convenient annual oversight with average monthly payments per year can be shown for amortization and linear mortgages. An oversight with monthly costs seperately can be shown too. Please check Options menu. -The mortgage calculator can be used for USA based mortgages, but also for other countries like the UK and India. Amounts shown are based on the default currency of your Android device. -Entered mortgage values can be stored, please check the Options menu.

description: ZOMBIES!, ZOMBIES!, ZOMBIES!!!!, They are everywhere!! Shoot the Zombies before they kill everyone you love. Arm yourself with a variety of high powered weapons and shoot your way to safety as the undead fall in masses before you. Gyro Poker combines slots and video poker. Try to make the best poker hand possible on each bet line played within two spins. After the first spin choose cards to hold. Scoring takes place after the second spin. If a HAND VOID card appears anywhere in a line on either spin, that hand is dead and cannot score any credits. Risk your winnings each spin by playing mini games such as high/low and red/black to further increase amount paid. Play One Deck mode where cards do not repeat between spins unless held by the player. This is traditional video poker. Play Multiple Deck mode where cards repeat increasing your chances of winning. This is more like a slot machine. GAME PLAY RULES: 1 Credit = Traditional Video Poker >1 Credit = Gyro Poker Slot Machine Play 1 - 4 credits to cover up to 4 lines 1 - 4 Horizontal Lines Costs zero credits to hold cards. Play 5 credits to cover up to 12 lines: 5 Horizontal Lines 5 Vertical Lines 2 Diagonal Lines (corner to corner) Costs 1 credit per each card held. NOTE: This game is FREE but contains some advertisements.

Lite Bike is an exciting arcade game inspired by Tron and similar 80s visual styles. There are no levels, your goal is simply to survive for as long as possible as your bike accelerates getting faster along endless tube. The longer you can avoid the obstacles and stay alive, the higher your score! Try playing on the harder difficulty settings for a score multiplier. If you set a good score, don't forget to post it to Facebook and brag about it! Don't forget to try the first person camera to really get you in on the action. Think you're good enough to set a high score? Test your reactions and find out! - 3 Difficulty modes - the faster they get the higher your score multiplier - Change camera! Play in first or third person mode - Post your score to Facebook! - Randomly generated obstacles, every play through is different!

Go anywhere you want in the sandbox arena whilst collecting fuel and health pickups to keep your bike going, your fuel is always running down so find as much as you can. The pickups are hidden everywhere around the arena, take on the obstacles and challenge games including Football and Bowling as you try to find them all! Earn stunt score as you drive around by performing jumps and drifts, you can also perform flips and spins while your bike is airborne! Think you can master all of the obstacles and challenges in the arena? - Free-roaming game play, go wherever you like! - Physics-based challenges including Football, Bowling and a Ball Pit - Advanced driving engine allows for drifting and jumps including flips and spins - Drive up walls and even ceilings if you go fast enough!

description: Heartland Hunters is proud to offer you What the Hunt! NOTE: If you're not happy with the App, please contact us! We're finding some are leaving negative feedback without understanding how to use the App! If you press "See All Game" from inside the app you'll see every species listed. Many of these will contain dates for the 2012 season as a reference. As soon as the new dates have been published we will be making the appropriate updates. See the Illinois hunting seasons at a glance, organized by date OR by game. Have you ever been turned around on the DNR website while trying to find out what you can hunt on a certain day but find that the site is organized according to species? We've turned that on its head and allow you to select your date and we'll show you what is available to hunt that day. Plan your vacations, see what is available to hunt this upcoming weekend, or check it while in the woods! Internet access is not required to use the app, just to download the periodic updates when you're within range. The app also gives you Sunrise/Sunset times for any date your planning for. Each version of the app will get you access to 1 year of updates. At the end of the year your data will NOT disappear. So if you purchase the 2013 version of the app then on 01/01/2014 your app will stop downloading updates but you will still see all published dates in 2013. Whether you hunt deer, ducks, turkey, or anything else- this App will help keep you on track!
release_text: Bug fixes: *App requires restart for some people when launching the app.

An HTC device with Sense 6 firmware is required to use this application! Will not work on any other device or AOSP firmware. Sense 6 firmware is a MUST! Flip Pro is an advanced home management application built based on HTC's Sense 6 sdk. Like the original Flip app for Sense 5, this version was built based off of user feedback, compact design, style, and to integrate with Sense 6 perfectly. This app was built for advance users wanting a more featured home management system for their device as Android 4.4 does come with its own home manager in the Android Settings. Quick Flip is a feature that is triggered by Home assist. Simply swipe up from the home button on your nav bar to trigger home assist. By default, this would launch google now but you may launch Flip from this gesture. Once triggered, Quick Flip will launch a small window of your installed launchers and allow you to quickly navigate from one launcher to another. This option may also be triggered by a notification in your statusbar and can be toggled by the user in the settings of the app. Original Features -HtcListView of installed launchers -HTC Sense 6 Actionbar providers (Clear Home, Set Home, App Settings) -On Click will take you directly to home launcher -Swipe up on home will launch Quick Flip -Quick Flip Notification selection -Developers Pick (Download Exclusive OEM launchers optimized for the ONE) -View Changelog of ongoing progress in development -View Contribution of application -Misc information about dev -Landscape and Portrait mode supported Clear Home option takes user directly to default launcher's app details in android settings, it is up to the user to select the Clear Defaults option.
release_text: Version 1.5 More Sense 6 Devices Support Added Cleaner Theme Updated Manifest

app_name: 어린이 영어/한글 동물놀이(유아 한글 영어 공부)
description: 36가지의 다양한 동물의 사진과 소리 그리고. 이름을 한글과 영어로 말해주는 재밌는 동물 놀이 어플입니다. 즐겁게 아이들이 사진을 터치하면서 단어를 공부도 할수도 있고. 동물의 소리를 들으며 재밌게 놀수있는 유아용 어플입니다. 간단하게 놀면서 동물 이름을 배워보아요.^^ 사용법 1.간단히 동물의 그림을 터치합니다. 2.동물의 사진을 터치하면 동물의 소리를 들을수있어요. (일부 동물은 지원하지 않아요.) 3.옆에 동물 이름을 터치하면 영어와 우리말로 말해줘요. 4.이전버튼이나 기기의 종료(이전)을 누르면 메인화면으로 복귀합니다. 5.페이지를 다음으로 넘길 수도 있어요. 종료는 우측상단의 버튼 또는 기기의 종료 버튼을 누릅니다. 6.도움말기능은 좌측상단의 버튼을 누르세요. 7.동물을 고르고 난 후에 밑에 작은 버튼으로 쉽게 이전/다음 동물로 넘어갈수있어요. 업데이트 내역 1.01: ① 팽귄과 코알라의 동물소리를 추가하였습니다. ② 동물을 고르고 난 후에 화면 하단의 동물 버튼으로 처음 메뉴 화면으로 돌아가지 않고 쉽게 이전/다음 동물로 넘어갈 수 있게 버튼을 추가하였습니다. ③ 버튼을 가운데와 상단 기준으로 맞추고 크기와 위치를 조정하였습니다. 1.02: 800*480 이상의 해상도에서도 동일하게 실행하도록 수정하여 편의성 강화. 1.03: 글자체 변경 1.04: ①동물을 9종 더 추가하였습니다.(총 45종) ②소문자를 읽지 못하는 어린이를 위해 대문자와 소문자를 같이 표기하였습니다. ③다음과 이전, 메뉴 글씨 대신 화살표 모양의 그림 형태로 UI가 바뀌었습니다. ---- 개발자 연락처 : +821033849840 And the 36 different types of animals picture and sound. The application name in English and Korean, telling funny animals play. Entertain the children touch the picture, studying the word, you can. Infant while listening to the sounds of the animals in fun buggerfuck that application. Learn the names of animals while playing a simple tune ^ ^ How to use Simply touch the picture of the animal. Touch the pictures of animals, hear animal sounds. Animals (some do not). 3 Touch the name of the animal in the next, and tell me with English and Korean. description: Refreshingly simple note-taking with free secure Encryption Life moves fast. Don't forget a thing, take notes. With Super Notes it's easy to create, edit and save notes * Share notes via email * Your notes can be organized * Password protection * SHA-512 password hashing * AES encryption. This app is simple but powerful. FREE UPDATES FOR LIFE.. (Weekly UPDATES) Next update, will be able to use with DropBox / SMS Sending/ Live FeedBack / More..

description: The power of magic jewels is in your hands! Switch and match 3 or more jewels to walk through more than 90 levels in this completely new hit puzzle adventure. Switch and match your way through more than 86 levels in this delicious and addictive puzzle adventure. Ain't it the sweetest game ever? Your mission is to find the candy and get it! Solve all the puzzles and try to get three stars in each level! Have fun in this puzzle adventure! Take on this deliciously sweet saga alone or play with friends! How to play: 1. swap the jewels to match 3 in a line to remove them 2. Clear all obstacle, Score 5000 points. 3. Kill Candy worm. 4. Arcade Mode: Reach a specific goal to solve the puzzle Game Features: - Sweet and shining Candy, so delicious! - Easy and fun to play, but a challenge to fully master. - Many challenging puzzles to make the game more addictive.

Can you run away from Slender Man? He is after you! He will try to find you and get you! Enjoy the amazing graphics and try to run away from Slender Man! In a scary and dark forest with ultra realistic and horrifc sound. And never look back he will be standing there!

description: Retro Game Collection is a collection of five classic video games: Ping Pong, Snake, Meteors, Aliens, and Block Breaker. Retro Game Collection is a completely free game with NO ADS! Just download and enjoy the memories. Ping Pong: Play against a computer or with a friend! Control the paddle with your finger and try to score on your opponent. Includes four difficulty settings. Snake: Eat food and watch your snake grow! Try to get the highest score possible. Control the snake by tapping where you want it to go. Includes four difficulty settings. Meteors: How long can you survive? Destroy the Meteors before they crash into your space ship and try to get the highest score possible. Aliens: Destroy wave after wave of Alien Invaders before they destroy you! Try to get the highest score possible. Block Breaker: Bounce a ball off of a paddle and break as many blocks as you can. Don't miss the ball with your paddle! Why download one game when you can download Retro Game Collection and get five amazing games in one! Download Retro Game Collection now and let the nostalgia begin. Thank you for helping us reach 10,000 downloads! A new retro game will be added when we reach 25,000 Downloads. Make sure to Rate/Review/Share with your friends. Nominate a classic game to be added by emailing: jackedStudio@gmail.com or by leaving your nomination in the review section!
release_text: - The 5th game has been added to the collection! Play the newest retro game "Block Breaker" Now! Updates: - Block Breaker added - Added D-Pad controls for snake - Updated main screen and instruction screens - Added settings screen for adjusting volume Previous Updates: - Aliens game added - Added high scores for Snake and Meteors - Reduced file size - Improved battery performance - Added a help screen on the main page
